title: Diagnose
description:
This app is intended FOR PHYSICIANS with a working knowledge of likelihood ratios and only available in ENGLISH. Otherwise, please do not download the app as it will not fit your needs.

This popular app which is used by over 130,000 physicians worldwide has just launched a premium version, which is updated with latest evidence from series such as the Journal of the American Medical Assocation's Rational Clinical Examination Series. 

****  'The top 10 quick reference medical apps for iPhone released in 2013' - iMedicalApps  *****


Diagnose is a novel medical app which aids clinicians in the diagnosis of common internal medicine conditions. The app allows users to incorporate validated findings from the history, physical examination and investigations to calculate an evidence-based likelihood of disease. This app is intended for use by internal medicine physicians and trainees, with the goal of improving patient care and medical education at the bedside. 

Diagnose provides you with an evidence-based pre-test probability, validated likelihood ratios and a calculated post-test probability based on your findings for over 45 of the most commonly seen conditions in internal medicine. The data is validated from sources (JAMA Rational Clinical Exam Series, etc).

When examining a patient with a presumptive diagnosis, such as stroke, physicians can now see in real-time how specific findings on the history, physical exam and laboratory evaluation of patients alters the likelihood of disease. 


"Diagnose is a fantastic app that encourages the application of evidence-based medicine in clinical practice."
- Daniel Schwartz, MD


The following evidence-based summaries are included in this app:
Acute Cholecystitis
Acute Otitis Media, Child
Alcohol Problems
Ascites
Bacteremia
Cancer, Family History
Cardiac Arrhythmia, Any
Cardiac Arrhythmia, Significant

comments: Excellent! I was just thinking of writing a similar app, turns out that I don't have to! Kudos for keeping it free. I am confident that the quality of care will increase if more doctors would use this app.
Very Nice App.
very helpful

*please do not use this app if you want to diagnose something, this app will not help. It is designed for physicians in aiding in an evidence based approach in diagnostics.*   What a fantastic app. Never has it been more simple to calculate the post test probability. Thank you so much for making this possible. Please do keep updating the database, even if a pay functionality is warranted.

This app organizes raw sign and symptom data to develop a differential diagnosis list. In reverse, it shows the weighting values. It is limited by a small diagnosis list and common diagnoses for which most physicians would not need assistance. It is well written but will see its true proof of concept as more diagnoses are added, bringing decision weight confabulation (in the programming sense) to the algorithm. Well done first effort! Peer reviewed crowd-sourcing might accelerate development.

title: NuvoAir Home: Improve Your Respiratory Health
description:
Time to measure and understand your respiratory health!

NuvoAir Home is the most advanced and easy to use respiratory app out there! It is designed to coach and guide you to perform lung function tests with the Air Next spirometer. NuvoAir Home provides you with real insights about how your respiratory health develops over time. It helps you manage your respiratory condition and take the most effective medical decisions in synergy with your physician.

NuvoAir Home is the right choice for patients with respiratory conditions such as Asthma, COPD, Cystic Fibrosis, IPF or patients with lung transplant.

NuvoAir Home is powered by Air Next, an award-winning professional spirometer designed for home use.

Key features

â€¢ Personal insights of your lung health trends.

â€¢ Measure total lung volume, first second volume, peak flow and ratio via Air Next

â€¢ Air quality in your area.

â€¢ Medication tracking.

â€¢ Symptoms tracking.

â€¢ Personal diary.

â€¢ Activity.

â€¢ Monthly insights.

â€¢ Your data can be automatically shared with your healthcare provider.

NuvoAir Home is not intended for diagnostic purposes.

The Air Next Spirometer

â€¢ It connects automatically and wirelessly to your mobile device via Bluetooth.

â€¢ It is maintenance free thanks to the hygienic and high precision disposable turbine. No need for sterilisation and calibration.

â€¢ The Air Next spirometer is as accurate as a professional spirometer, but costs a fraction of it.

(It is required to be able to perform spirometry tests with NuvoAir Home)

Find out more at www.nuvoair.com

Technicalities

â€¢ The app connects with Health App from Apple, so you can export spirometer data (FVC, FEV1, PEF) from the Air app to the Health App.

â€¢ The app shows expected test results, predicted by height, age, gender and ethnicity.

â€¢ The Air Next is intended to measure the forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1), the peak expiratory flow (PEF) and the forced vital capacity (FVC) in a forced expiratory maneuver. These measures can be used for the detection, assessment and monitoring of certain lung diseases.

â€¢ NuvoAir Home is CE Certified as a Class Im Medical Device. NuvoAir is ISO 13485 certified.

Perfil PACIENTE

Distribuido por diversas pantallas encontrarÃ¡ todos los consejos, controles y ayuda para facilitar que el paciente EPOC tenga un buen control de su enfermedad.

Pantalla INFORMACIÃ“N: EducaciÃ³n sanitaria y actividades sobre quÃ© es la EPOC y quÃ© actividad fÃ­sica y dieta se le recomienda. TambiÃ©n encontrarÃ¡ un enlace a nuestra pÃ¡gina web con informaciÃ³n ampliada.

AdemÃ¡s de estas pantallas, la misma aplicaciÃ³n segÃºn como este de avanzada su enfermedad le recordarÃ¡ cuÃ¡ndo se le recomienda un control por su mÃ©dico, enfermera y realizarse una espirometrÃ­a. TambiÃ©n le avisarÃ¡ de vacunarse de la gripe y el neumococo.

MÃºltiples pantallas de la aplicaciÃ³n (por ejemplo, las mejoras que percibe al dejar de fumar) las podrÃ¡ compartir en redes sociales para conseguir el Ã¡nimo de sus amigos.

Perfil PROFESIONAL

Consta de dos pantallas: PACIENTES ASIGNADOS y TEST

Pantalla PACIENTES ASIGNADOS: La APP crea un cÃ³digo aleatorio al introducir sus datos personales. Si facilita este cÃ³digo a su paciente y Ã©l lo adjunta en la casilla correspondiente de su perfil podrÃ¡ visualizar parte de las actividades que hace. AdemÃ¡s, con estos datos, y si posee sus datos espiromÃ©tricos, la APP le calcularÃ¡ su Ã­ndice BODE/BODEx, su fenotipo y el tratamiento recomendado segÃºn la guÃ­a GEDAPS.

Pantalla TEST:

En esta pantalla podrÃ¡ realizar varios test sin que tengan que estar vinculados a ningÃºn paciente, para poder realizarlos con personas que no tengan la aplicaciÃ³n. Los test incluidos son:

AVISO LEGAL: Esta aplicaciÃ³n estÃ¡ realizada por profesionales sanitarios (mÃ©dicos y enfermeras) y es una ayuda y una guÃ­a para el paciente EPOC, pero cada persona tiene caracterÃ­sticas, condiciones y necesidades diferentes, por eso en NINGUN caso sustituye el consejo de su mÃ©dico/enfermera de referencia. title: Breathings - Mindful Breathing App
description:
The most basic way to do mindful breathing is simply to focus your attention on your breath, the inhale and exhale

This app is designed to make you feel relaxed. just devote 5 minutes of your day to this mindful breathing exercise and feel the difference.

    Find a comfortable, straight sitting position.
    Set your intention to focus on your breathing as best you can.
    Focus on your breathing.
    Gently bring your mind back to your breathing.
    Try to synchronize your breathing with the app.
     Keep practicing daily.

This mindfulness meditation practice will help you calm yourself down when you are going through anxiety, depression, mood swings, negative emotions, worried, stressed, panic. Just the simple art of focusing on breath will help you gain focus and relax, because you are bringing your mind in this very moment. Start today for a happier future self.

Practice this breathing technique to develop gratefulness, peace, awareness, kindness and compassion. And yes, this is possible. 

Happy Breathing.

title: Breathe â€¢ Calm down â€¢ Meditate
description:
Minimalistic (yet highly customizable) breath meditation app without ads or distractions. Including a meditation timer.

Choose from well explored breathing rhythms - or create your own - to activate your parasympathetic nervous system.

Learning how to to relax is just like training a muscle (in the brain) - the more you exercise, the stronger it will become.
Build up resilience now and benefit from a clear and functional mind when undergoing stress. Become a less stressed, more compassionate, more healthy human.

Breathing techniques: Custom, Coherent Breathing, Box Breathing, 478, 1:2

The app helps you to: meditate, relax, calm down, fall asleep

title: Respiratory System
description:
From this App you can learn :

Delineate the structures of respiratory system and their functions.
Describe the basic structure and function of human lungs.
Define "respiratory cycle" and distinguish between inspiration and expiration.
Understand and explore the mechanism of breathing control in lungs.
Explore how gases are exchanged during breathing.
Systematize the path of a molecule of oxygen as it passes from the human nose to an alveolus. 
List some of the diseases/conditions that badly influence the mechanism of breathing.
Classify several common respiratory disorders according to their causative agents.

More details please visit http://www.wonderwhizkids.com/


"Wonderwhizkids.com" hosts concept oriented content in Maths & Sciences
specially designed for K-8 to K-12 grades. "Wonderwhizkids (WWK) enables
students to enjoy learning with application oriented, visually rich
content which is simple and easy to understand. The content is aligned to
best practices of learning and teaching.

Students can develop strong basics, critical thinking and problem
solving skills to do well in school and beyond. Teachers can use WWK as a
reference material to be more creative in designing engaging learning
experiences. Parents also can actively participate in their child's
development through WWK".

This topic covers under Biology subject as a part of the Human Physiology topic
and this topic contains following sub topics 
Respiratory System
Respiratory Cycle
Breathing Control
Lung Diseases
Respiratory Disorders

comments: This really helps me, especially the deep calm breathing pattern. Fantastic if you are looking at the screen because it paces you when the inhale, hold and exhale have a different length (4,7,8) The vibrate on step change is also super useful if you can't look at the screen. The only thing I'd really love is a better visualization for when you are holding your breath, but that's a pretty minor quibble. It's great. Try it.

I want to thank the developers for making such a great app. In the current scenario where everyone is making an app that's meant more for gaining profits than making impact on people's lives, this app is meant for the well being of people. Thanks for keeping it add free. Recommended to each and everyone who's thinking of looking after their mental health.

I love the simplicity! And I am thrilled to see the custom timed setting! I like to inhale for 5 seconds through my nose, hold for 5 seconds, and fully exhale for 15 seconds through my mouth, then pause for 2 seconds, and repeat! I can do that with this app perfectly for my specific lung capacity. Thank you so much for this simple 'does exactly what it claims to do' app. It's a real ... breath of fresh air! :)

Hi, I really like the app! I don't think I will continue to use it as I need something where I can change pattern in the middle of a session, but if I didn't need this it'd be great. I prefer to change on the fly, but if enough people wanted it maybe consider adding something where, when setting up the pattern in advance, you can set multiple sets of patterns with a duration for each? Would also love to pick colors, and more sounds. But honestly this really is a lovely app, thank you!!

Really liked it! Simple and just perfect app for breathing exercises and meditation. However, doing for 7 minutes is not enough. Please provide an option of 10 ,15, 20 ,30 mins too in the settings. And may be a graph for duration and consistency.

title: HealthView 365 - Track Glucose, BP, Weight, Asthma
description:
Track and Manage Blood Glucose (Diabetes, A1C), Blood Pressure (BP), Blood Oxygen (Oximeter, SPO2), Obesity, Weight, Heart Rate, Arrhythmia (Irregular Heartbeat), Asthma, COPD, Sleep, Fitness all in one app.

Get insights into your health conditions, determine root cause of factors affecting your conditions. Get early warning alerts to your potential chronic conditions.

1. Connect and sync with medical and fitness devices.
2. Connect with your physicians and they can view your measurements real-time.
3. Provides Health Score and several insights that helps to keep your chronic conditions in-check and better them over time.
4. Connects with Fitbit online to sync and provide detailed daily insights.
5. Provides insights on health effects with respect to time of day, location, weather and diet.


125 Million patients have chronic conditions (Diabetes, BP, Obesity, Asthma). With HealthView 365 you can track and manage all your Chronic Conditions and Fitness realtime.

Connect with your physician in realtime and they can remotely monitor all your medical data and vital measurements.

Works with OMRON, iHealth, Fitbit, Nokia Withings, 23andMe and many other devices.

title: Wash Mnl Pulmonary Medicine Subspecialty Consult
description:
Written by residents, fellows, and attending physicians, this handbook is ideal for residents called on to do an inpatient consult, for students working on an inpatient medicine service, and for specialists seeking information on pulmonology and general internal medicine management.

DESCRIPTION
Concise, portable, and user-friendly, The Washington ManualÂ® Pulmonology Subspecialty Consult, 2nd Edition, provides quick access to the essential information needed to evaluate patients on a subspecialty consult service. This edition offers state-of-the-art content on the diagnosis, investigation, and treatment of common acute and chronic lung diseases, including coverage of advancing technologies and therapeutics. Ideal for fellows, residents, and medical students rotating on pulmonology subspecialty services, the manual is also useful as a first-line resource for internists and other primary care providers.

Key Features
- Thoroughly revised to include expanded diagnostic testing and therapies for pulmonary diseases.
- A reorganized, templated format throughout ensures that you can find what you need quickly and easily.
- Comprehensive coverage of asthma, COPD, interstitial lung disease, pulmonary hypertension, cystic fibrosis, pulmonary infections, lung transplantation, sleep-disordered breathing, and other common pulmonary conditions provides practical clinical information to diagnose and treat a variety of patients.
- Symptoms, signs, and problems encountered in daily practice are presented in a quick-reference bulleted format.
- Updated references are provided for readers who would like additional information on a particular topic.
- Written by fellows and junior faculty from the Washington University School of Medicine in St. Louis to effectively address real-life clinical experiences.

title: The Washington Manual of Critical Care App
description:
The Washington Manual of Critical Care, similar to other volumes in this vaunted series, features authors and contributors who are faculty members and practicing physicians at Washington Universityâ€™s School of Medicine. Inside youâ€™ll find comprehensive and current information for bedside diagnosis and management of some of the most common illnesses and problems encountered in the ICU setting.

Download the FREE app and view selected topics
- Approximately 10% of the content is viewable in the free app and tapping on the locked topic will launch the in-app purchase screen. 

Key Features:
Covers the treatment and management of shock, sepsis, acute episodes of COPD and asthma, myocardial infarctions, organ failure, and other conditions and disorders.
Provides overviews of intubation and catheterization procedures, as well as of common drug side effects and drug-drug interactions.
Contributors hail from departments in Internal Medicine, Neurology, Surgery, Obstetrics and Gynecology, and Anesthesiology.
New chapters have been added on ECLS, critical care ultrasound, rheumatology, and management of transplant patients.
Includes concise, easy-to-read diagnosis and treatment algorithms for common conditions, plus bibliographical references for additional, in-depth reading. 

Based on the print:
- 3rd Edition
- ISBN/ISSN: 9781496328519
- Author: Marin Kollef MD

SPECIAL APP FEATURES:
Locate a disease, symptom or medication in the fastest possible manner:
- Tap and Hold launch icon to open Last Topic, History, Favorites
- Navigate using multiple indices
- History to open frequently visited pages
- Bookmarks 

NEVER FORGET ANYTHING:
Mark topics with relevant information:
- Voice Notes
- Annotations with scribble, doodle or text
You choose the method to note this regardless of the context you are in to ensure that the important facts are available whenever you access the topic, whether it is tomorrow or six months from now.

title: Propeller
description:
Propeller can help you follow your treatment plan and take control of your asthma.

Propeller is a digital health tool that has been used by over 100,000 people worldwide. The Propeller sensor discretely attaches to your asthma inhaler, gathers information about your medication use and sends that information to the Propeller app. The app builds your profile and provides personalized support to help you follow your doctor-recommended treatment plan.



Have a complete record
The Propeller sensor and app automatically record when you use your medication. 

Never forget a dose
Medication reminders can include chiming sensors, push notifications and in-app reminders.

Reports at your fingertips
Monthly summaries of inhaler use are accessible in the Propeller app and by email, and they can be easily shared with your doctor.

Start each day with confidence
A daily Asthma Outlook plus air quality and weather forecasts are generated based on your location.

Discover your triggers
You can keep a record of when and where you use your rescue inhaler to help learn what may be causing your flare-ups.

Find a lost inhaler 
You can use the Find My Inhaler feature of the Propeller app to â€œringâ€ a misplaced inhaler.

If you have asthma, ask your doctor if Propeller is compatible with your treatment.

comments: This app has helped me stay on track with taking my daily medications and gives me a heads-up of how the weather is for the day being a severe asthmatic this app is extremely useful.

It's a good app and it actually really helps me but, for some reason It doesn't keep track of the medications I take for example, when I take 2 puffs of me dulera medication it says I only took 1 puff when I actually take 2 puffs and then it says I'm not taking my medication but I am it's just the app is messed up I've tried everything, adjusting the censor etc, can you fix this so my doctors don't think I'm slacking, because I'm not like that I take all my medication.
Great for tracking my asthma attacks and love being able to see air quality stats!
Great app very useful for keeping track of my medications

Thank You! The integrated weather and air quality in your app will make it easier to keep track of breathing changes now! Sensors work well with designated medicine dispensers. Display of actual weather and air quality values would be informative. Ability to enter User data and Notes with each recording would be helpful. Update: Developer responded quickly to posted review and discussed app capabilities and noted suggested improvements. Looking forward to feature changes in future releases.

title: 4-7-8 Relax Breathing
description:
The 4-7-8 breathing technique is a breathing pattern developed by Dr. Andrew Weil. Itâ€™s based on an ancient yogic technique called pranayama, which helps practitioners gain control over their breathing.

The technique can achieve the following: 

â€¢ reduce anxiety

â€¢ help you to get sleep

â€¢ managing cravings

â€¢ controlling or reducing anger responses


How to do it:

Before starting the breathing pattern, adopt a comfortable sitting or lying position

â€¢ empty the lungs of air, breathe in quietly through the nose for 4 seconds

â€¢ hold the breath for a count of 7 seconds

â€¢ exhale through the mouth, pursing the lips and making a "whoosh" sound, for 8 seconds

â€¢ repeat the cycle up to 4 times

Dr. Weil recommends using the technique at least twice a day to start seeing the benefits sooner. He also suggests that people avoid doing more than four breath cycles in a row until they have more practice with the technique.

A person may feel lightheaded after doing this for the first few times. Therefore, it is advisable to try this technique when sitting or lying down to prevent dizziness or falls.

recentChanges: - you can now select male or female voice for vocal cues
comments: Simple and effective way to enhance breath for better health

Absolute perfection! Also respectful to give praise to Dr. Weil who popularized this. I needed this. It's perfect as is. The only added feature I may want is the ability to record my own voice and use it for the inhale, hold, exhale vocal cues. But it doesn't matter. I thank you for creating this!!! Edit. Please bring back the original voice in the first version as an option. The updated graphics are great tho.

Almost perfect, the only drawback is the app stops when the screen goes off. And also as Dr. Weil suggested you can do this exercise slower or faster. So the ability to slow it down, and still have your cues, voice or sound, would be perfect. Thanks for taking the time to make it.

This is somewhat what I was searching for. A simple yet elegant timer for breathing exercises but I wish there was a sound instead of a voice. Three different sounds for inhale, hold and exhale. The voice is kind of ruining the moment.
Very simple , useful and effective app. Sound is also very soothing.

title: Paced Breathing
description:
Paced Breathing helps you improve your breathing by giving you visual, audio, and haptic (vibrate) breathing cues.

This isn't just useful for yoga and meditation, but intense exercise training too.

Just pick a comfortable starting point and start improving your breathing!

Included Features:
* Adjustable Session Times (inhale, exhale)
* Ramping Times Up or Down
* Visual, Audio, and Haptic Cues
* Custom Breathing Profiles
* Tons of sound choices, like Binaural beats (use with headphones)
* Breathes Per Minute (BPM) Tracker

In-App Purchases:
* Ad-free upgrade
* Advanced upgrade, includes:
  ** unlimited profiles
  ** additional sound (female voice)
  ** additional color theme (dark)

Prefer a Pro version instead of making individual In-App Purchases?
Paced Breathing Pro is the same as this Free version with the Advanced and Ad-Free upgrades already included.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.apps.paced.breathing.pro

Questions? https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/paced-breathing
Tutorials http://pacedbreathing.blogspot.com
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/PacedBreathing
Google+ https://google.com/+PacedbreathingBlogspotBreathesEasy

comments: Nice app. Very useful. My one more suggestion is please add some sound (male/female/binaural) for Hold. Sure it will help more. Thank you so much developer team. Sure I will suggest to my friendsðŸ˜ŠðŸ™â¤ï¸
the only good breathing app. excellent, easy to use, intuitive. very powerful.

Works very well for HRV biofeedback paced breathing. Simple and easy and the visual and sound cues are crisp and make it easy to know exactly when to start and stop each inhale, exhale and pause. The only issue is the blue color which can interfere with sleep. A warmer color scheme would also be easier on the eyes at night.

The app is Nice but no update in 5 years??!!!!! And why can't I download some breathing profiles/schemes? For example some pranayama or some holotropic breathing. Maybe some other sound available? What if I want to rename a breathing profile for save it when I change smartphone? Nothing! I mean it's still a valid app but no one behind it. No updates no improvements. I'll change my review as soon as the developer want to show up./ I purchased the app like 4 years ago, I paid for pro version and I didn't see any improvement. Unfortunately.

Great app. One of the best I've tried. I rely on the vibrate feature. (The voices and sounds are otherwise very distracting). The vibrate is not working on my pixel 2 xl anymore. Not sure if it was an update from you or something else but without the vibrate feature working I can't really use it anymore.

title: Dr. Lung
description: Lung Doctor is an application for users with abnormal lung function such as asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. Users can cooperate with CONTEC spirometer to test their lung function status, and to understand the test data and lung function parameter trends in detail, to facilitate patient self-monitoring and management and doctors to check the condition.

title: Biofeedback Meditation : Deep Relaxation Breathing
description:
Guided meditation with instant feedback! As you deviate from your meditation, the app detects your breathing pattern and the waves will gently notify you. Earn "Karma Points" by breathing rhythmically.  No more meditation sessions where you wander off.


The best way to use the app is to use the phone while performing  shavasana (corpse pose in yoga/ sleeping meditation / yoga nidra).  If you wish to receive feedback while sitting, you could slide the phone halfway into your pants, so that the phone moves when you breathe. The elastic on the pant's belt line should hold the phone in place.

Set a target breathing rate that is comfortable and meditate on your breath.
Lie down on your back, place the phone on your abdomen and try to breathe at the target rate.
The waves will calm down as you start breathing at your target rate.

This app can also be used as a standalone app without biofeedback, for paced breathing, mindfulness training or sleep music


â€¢ Only app to provide instant feedback on your meditation
â€¢ Interactive meditation may help with relaxation and going to sleep
â€¢ May calm down anxious thoughts and manage stress
â€¢ Mindfulness may help with depression and panic attacks
â€¢ No expensive equipment to provide biofeedback, an affordable alternative to buying sensors.
â€¢ Helps with paced breathing, belly breathing, diaphragmatic breathing, deep breathing, box breathing, guided pranayama and other breathing exercises.
â€¢ Diaphragmatic breathing is an easy way to relax and release your worries.
â€¢ Diaphragmatic breathing is suggested as a remedy for Asthma and COPD
â€¢ Waves, rain and flute sounds as background music
â€¢ Breath in,Breath out  vipassana style breathing prompts
â€¢ Other breathing prompts include a metronome sound and om chants.
â€¢ The app comes with a Meditation timer
â€¢ If you have trouble falling asleep for a power nap, this may be the app for you.
â€¢ Biofeedback games for your meditation practice
â€¢ Turn biofeedback into a meditation game
â€¢ Free

Read more about efficacy of biofeedback at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2939454/ 
Content licenses at https://biofeedbackmeditation.wordpress.com/attribution
Learn more about https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diaphragmatic_breathing

developerAddress: Jai Matha, Mahakali Marg, Ambalpady, Udupi, Karnataka, India -576103
recentChanges: Calibration for improved sensitivity. Calibration maybe helpful on certain phones.
comments: A good app for focusing on breathing simple and effective. Helps in maintaining a steady pace as pre defined by the user. The free sounds provided as background sounds are very relaxing and go well with the breathing instructions.
A cool app. Simple to understand and use with clear instructions. I used it and felt relaxed in a few minutes.
Nice idea but too fast to relax. I'd like 5 breath cycles per minute which would feel more coherent. Unfortunately the app starts at 6 breaths per minute

The app wouldn't open. all I got was the page telling you about it and the link to read the terms. When you go to the link it sends you back to Google play to download the app. but it is already downloaded.

It works really well for me. I am able to get into a focused and conscious state while my body gets into a relaxed state. I only wish we had a way to record karma points. For the price I paid in my local currency it is worth the money!

title: Dandelion (Breathing Games)
description:
Make a long exhalation to blow away the dandelion.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Breathing games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

title: Guidelines And Criteria
description:
The American College of Rheumatologyâ€™s Guideline and Criteria App is the go-to tool for implementing guideline recommendations and criteria sets into practice. Free to both members and non-members, this app is ACRâ€™s mobile home for tools and content for clinicians caring for patients with rheumatic diseases. App features include: interactive tools to inform treatment decisions at the point of care, including algorithms, score and calculators; full guideline and criteria content; keyword searches; customizable bookmarks; and note-taking capabilities.

Current guidelines and criteria in the app include:

Â· Guideline for the Treatment of Rheumatoid Arthritis

Â· Guideline for the Prevention and Treatment of Glucocorticoid-Induced Osteoporosis

Â· Guideline for the Perioperative Management of Antirheumatic Medication in Patients with Rheumatic Diseases Undergoing Total Hip or Knee Arthroplasty

Â· Guideline for Treatment of Psoriatic Arthritis

Â· Rheumatoid Arthritis Classification Criteria

Â· Systemic Sclerosis Classification Criteria

Â· Gout Classification Criteria

Â· Sjogrenâ€™s Syndrome Classification Criteria

Â· Myositis Classification Criteria

Stay tuned for ongoing updates, as well as new guideline and criteria tools and content.

Send feedback to the ACR directly from the App Information page or post a review in the App Store. 
Help us find new and better ways to deliver guideline and criteria content to clinicians.

description:

DLCO gas diffusion
Impulse Oscillometry

title: MyCOPD Assistant
description:
MyCOPD Assistant helps those with COPD better manage their symptoms and condition. 

It provides warnings about potential flare-ups/exacerbations before they happen and gives physicians better visibility into your condition to improve your treatment plan.

title: hiCare Chronic
description:
Chronic diseases are the kind of prevalent health conditions that need regular monitoring. Irregular management may lead to unnecessary health complications, ER visits, hospitalization, and may cause incurring of more expenses while simultaneously reducing quality of life.

Hifiniteâ€™s hiCare Chronic Disease Management app helps providers and caretakers by letting them engage with chronic patients in real time using modern technologies. hiCare helps patients track their health, allows self-scheduling, alerts providers and caretakers to address issues before they become worse, and allows remote access to providers.

Whether you are maintaining a Blood Pressure or Blood Sugar diary, are tracking COPD conditions, or are monitoring your body temperature, hiCare Chronic Disease Management app is the ultimate health companion for you and your loved ones. Letâ€™s see how!
 
How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management app work?
â€¢      Patients use connected probes and sensors through hiCare Chronic Disease Management app running on their smartphone to collect their vitals and medication adherence data. All this data is securely transmitted and stored on an HIPAA compliant cloud-based hiCare Chronic Platform.  
â€¢      Healthcare providers including physicians, nurses, and family members use the hiCare Chronic Disease Management app on their smartphones to monitor a patientâ€™s vitals, compliance, and medication adherence data.  
â€¢      The system allows clinical staff to set custom thresholds for each patient. Whenever a patient takes a reading and the vital sign crosses the set threshold, an instant alert is sent to the providers and caretakers. The system provides multiple means of communication for parties to engage and resolve an emergency.
 
How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management benefit the patients?
â€¢      hiCare user dashboard displays the patientâ€™s overall health status by showing vitals such as temperature, blood pressure, blood glucose level, capacity of vitals, blood oxygen saturation, weight and pulse rate, amongst others.
â€¢      Patients can engage with their providers via calls, chats, SMS, and emails. 
â€¢      Patients can request an online appointment with the providers anytime, anywhere.
â€¢      Patients can schedule online appointments for video consultation and setup reminder notifications for the same.
â€¢      Patients can invite their friends and family to be up-to-date on their health status by allowing them to join their care circle.  
â€¢      Patients can track their overall health score based on adherence, vitals, and compliance rates.
â€¢      Patients can view their electronic health record, which includes allergies, diagnoses, lab reports, medications, vaccinations, and medical procedures.
â€¢      Additionally, patients can sign consent forms electronically, pay bills, view invoices, view the provider directory, and take surveys for helping collect subjective health data.
 
How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management benefit the providers?
â€¢      hiCare user dashboard displays the list of patients who need urgent care, based on their overall health score, along with the upcoming schedules of the logged-in user.
â€¢      Providers can view their patientsâ€™ overall health status based on adherence, vitals, and compliance rates. 
â€¢      Providers can actively engage with their patients via calls, chats, SMS, and email. 
â€¢      Providers can schedule and conduct video consultations with their patients.
 
To use the hiCare Chronic Disease Management app, you must have a hiCare account with Hifinite. 

 About hiCare
Hifinite aims to bring Highly Optimized Patient, Provider and Partner Engagement (H.O.P.E.), securely, in real-time, through hiCare, as a comprehensive, integrated technology solution, making an impact through integrating a variety of digital health products.   
Hifinite is truly  Health. Connected.

title: Respiratory Disease
description:
This Oxford University Press app-book, Respiratory Disease From advanced disease to bereavement, is developed by MedHand Mobile Libraries. Improve your performance with relevant, valid material which is accessed quickly and with minimal effort in the palm of your hand using Medhands patented technology. 

Functions include:  

â€¢	A powerful search 
â€¢	Bookmarks, History and Highlighting  
â€¢	Complete set of medical calculators; Body Mass Index, Peak Expiratory Flows, Dehydration Correction Calculator and more 
â€¢	Notes and picture notes

About this title

Respiratory disease is the second most common cause of death worldwide. Patients with advanced non-malignant disease, such as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, have similar or even greater health care needs than those with advanced lung cancer. Uncontrolled symptoms, distress, and social isolation contribute to the poor quality of life experienced by such patients. 

This book provides practical guidance to professionals who care for patients with advanced respiratory disease. It gives evidence-based advice on a wide range of topics, including management of respiratory and non-respiratory symptoms, chronic respiratory failure, and respiratory emergencies. Recognition of when a patient may be approaching the end of life can be particularly challenging in patients with advanced respiratory disease. Ways to facilitate prognostication are covered, along with the significant communication and ethical challenges that this phase of life can present.

Written by a respiratory specialist and two palliative medicine physicians, this book will be of great value to doctors, nurses, and allied healthcare professionals working in respiratory medicine and in palliative care, both in relation to everyday clinical practice as well as meeting the requirements for postgraduate exams.

Authors: Anna Spathis, Helen E. Davies, and Sara Booth

________________________________________ 

MedHand Mobile Libraries offers a SUBSCRIPTION FREE application without edition upgrade. Offering most trusted and well recognized medical guidelines provided by excellent publishers like Oxford University Press, McGraw-Hill, Pharmaceutical Press, Wiley, Elsevier and more.

title: Awesome Breathing: Pacer for Meditation and Stress
description:
Awesome Breathing is a simple, elegant tool to guide and visualize your breathing. Use it daily to help with meditation, sleep, stress, anxiety, or to simply bring a few moments of calm or mindfulness to your day.

"Beautiful and responsive UI with customizable breathing patterns."

"I became interested recently in breathwork. This app is a fantastic aid to that work. I only discovered it after weeks of using stopwatches and timers. Great app, thank you!!!!"

"Excellent app, simple to use. As a psychotherapist I am using it myself and recommending to clients who might benefit."

"Simple. Intuitive. Beautiful UI and gestures. Amazing breath app that helps you stay mindful."

Features:

â€¢ Clean, simple interface allows for uncluttered and calming breathing experience
â€¢ Fully customizable inhale, exhale, and (optional) pause durations
â€¢ Choose from included programs such as Box Breathing, Relaxing Breathing, Equal Breathing, Measured Breathing, and Triangle Breathing
â€¢ Create and save custom programs!
â€¢ Sessions can be free-form (no duration) or timed duration (up to 30 minutes)
â€¢ Optional pre-session countdown timer allows for a few moments to "settle in" before your session begins
â€¢ Choose from several pacer color themes
â€¢ Optional guided vocal cues signal when to inhale, exhale, and hold so breathing can be done without looking at your device
â€¢ Vibration mode allows for silent breathing sessions
â€¢ Bells can be enabled to signal the beginning and end of your sessions

Included Programs:

Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)

Also known as Navy SEAL or tactical breathing, this is a surprisingly simple and effective way to help regain calm and control of your thoughts when under stress. Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. All through your nose.

Relaxing Breathing (4-7-8)

Have trouble falling asleep? Try this 4-7-8 technique. Inhale for 4 through your nose, hold for 7, exhale for 8 out of your mouth.

Equal Breathing (4-4)

A pranayama practice called Sama Vritti, this breath can help take your mind off the racing thoughts or whatever might be distracting you. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4. All through your nose. (Try a 6 or 8 count, once you feel comfortable.)

Measured Breathing (4-1-7)

A handy stress-reducing practice that can be done anywhere, anytime. Inhale for 4, hold for 1, exhale for 7. All through your nose.

Triangle Breathing (4-4-4)

Another great technique that can help alleviate anxiety or stress. Imagine a triangle with equal sides. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4, pause for 4. Repeat.

We hope Awesome Breathing helps you reach your goals, and look forward to being a part of your journey. We are just getting started, so would love to hear your reviews and feedback!

recentChanges: You can now create and save custom programs - our most requested feature! We've also added a tones-based audio cue option and more pacer color themes. ðŸŽ‰
comments: This is a really fantastic breathing app. It is intuitive to use, has a range of common preprogrammed exercise but it is also extremely easy to create and customise your own. An added bonus is the lack of intrusive ads. If there is a better free breathing app I would be really surprised.

Wow! Truly an awesome app. I can customize inhale, hold, exhale, hold to 10th of sec. App calculates breaths per minute. I can set total time for a session. Audio cues mean I can breathe with my eyes closed. All of these can be saved to my own custom sessions. The added bonus is the ability to set notifications during the day to remind myself it's time to do a session. Great app!

It's rare that I will give something a positive rating after a mere two days but I am experiencing here with this program is amazing! I have done breathing exercises on my own and under guidance with varying degrees of positive results but this app is (even compared to a teacher's instruction) head and shoulders above everything else! Simple UI, voice and visual guidance, great programs that you can easily dedicate daily practice to...it's just great!

This is a great app for it lets you customized your own breathing program of inhales and exhales in decimal second increments. It also has a timer for how many minutes you want to do the breathing. I really wish they had a better choice for the beginning and end sound beside that loud gong noise for it is distracting after being relaxed from the meditative breathing. That is why the 4 rating.

An excellent app. Specifically because the custom timer allows for tenth of a second adjustments which allows me to set 5.5 second breaths for optimum resonant breathing sessions. I would give 5 stars were I able to set my own colours on the visualiser and change the jarring bell sound to something more muted and soft. This is an app I will use every day.

title: Sensely
description:
Senselyâ€™s avatar and chatbot-based platforms assist insurance plan members and patients with the insurance services and healthcare resources they need, when they need it. The easy to use app enables enterprises to converse with their members in an entirely new way, combining the empathy of human conversation with the efficiency and scalability of technology. 

With the Sensely app, patients have several options (depending on their provider) including: 
- checking symptoms and connecting with a live nurse if necessary
- managing chronic conditions such as Heart Failure, Diabetes, Asthma, and COPD
- receiving self care from a rich repository of medical knowledge
- scheduling in-person clinician appointments 
- locations of the nearest pharmacies, access to other medical professionals

title: Balloon (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow up balloons and collect extra points by making your exhalation longer.

Breathing Games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.

WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/

Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

title: Vivify Health
description:
Managing chronic health conditions such as asthma, diabetes, cholesterol, COPD, and high blood pressure can be overwhelming and costly.  Our solution increases the efficiencies of health care teams while reducing costs and improving patient outcomes by making it simple for patients to participate in and manage their health.

Personalized for you, our program combines easy-to-use tools with real-time clinical support and on-demand coaching to help you stay as healthy as possible with:   

â€¢ Custom Pathways - Content tailored just for you and your health condition(s)
â€¢ Biometric Trending - For your Bluetooth-integrated Blood Pressure and/or Blood Glucose devices
â€¢ Resource Library - Educational articles and videos curated specifically towards your health condition(s)
â€¢ Messaging - Easily connect with your health care team for questions about your health condition(s)
â€¢ Virtual Visits - Speak securely with your entire health care team, face-to-face

Our program protects your personal health information (PHI) using secure bi-directional communication with your health care team and is HIPAA compliant.

comments: I have been using app with my devices and entering manually no problems. Now I just paired the devices my insurance sent me and this works well also. Satisfied.
There is No Begin Session Button to hit to Start.

This app is not working. I have tried several times over the weekend to update and it keeps circling back to the start. App is very slow so I am not going to keep wasting my time with this. I will keep adding info until it quits and let UHC figure it out.

App stopped notifying me of when I needed to check in. Each time I log in app says there's a new update. I've checked google store and there's no new update available. I guess app will no longer work until glitch is fixed.

This app is awesome. It has helped me so much in keeping up with my bp & wt. But the nurse call option and all the helpful videos from recipes to yoga to meditation...did I mention this app was awesome!

title: Breathe
description:
Breathe is an app designed to help you â€˜watch your breathâ€™. For centuries, deep breathing has been an integral part of meditation practices. It has more recently been adopted by everyone from world class athletes to the U.S. army. Studies have shown that with regular practice meditation can reduce anxiety, stress, and depression. Cognitive benefits include improved focus, memory and decision making. The phrase â€˜watch your breathâ€™ is common among meditation practitioners, and is actualised in Breathe: there are animations to signal your inhales and exhales, and you have tools to customize the length of each breath. Intentionally breathing in and out can be a powerful, calming, and joyful experience.

Breathe is offered free, with no ads and no hidden features.


Android permissions requested are to enhance the app during usage (prevent device from sleeping) and to provide anonymous usage reporting (network permissions for Google's Firebase library) to steer further development. 
No access is made to contacts or data stored on device.


Feedback, suggestion, translations or other comments welcome via email to apps@jatra.co.uk

summary: Assisting you in controlling your breathing.
recentChanges: This release has sound handling improved a bit - especially for the longer duration sounds. Also squashed a couple of pesky bugs. If you see anything you think needs fixing, please email apps@jatra.co.uk
comments: I like this app. One thing that would make it better is the ability to set a timer inside it. I don't look at the screen when I breathe with this app. I just listen to the sounds and close my eyes. If I want to breathe for, say, 8 minutes, it would be great if there was a timer I could set in the app that would notify me when I've completed the 8 minutes. Right now, I have to use a separate app for the timer, which is an inelegant solution.

Like the calm interface, the gentle oscillating graphic and particularly like the simple piano tones for breathing. I do wish it had a start button on entering the app. At the moment, as soon as the app opens, it starts. I would prefer to be able to initiate that myself. But still, my preferred app for general breathing exercises. Nice, thank you for the app development.
Would be very helpful to have a timer within the app. Some different sounds would be great too. However! It does what it says on the box. Great app.
Would be better if it included a list of common breathing techniques, and that this app should be open sourced and hosted in F-Droid.

This app needs more recognition, it's easy to use, very customizable, and relaxing. I wish I wouldn't have to set my breathing preferences every time I open the app, but it's one of the best breathing apps by far. Just try it.

title: Breathing Exercise - The Breathing App
description:
Breathing Exercise - The Breathing App is  just one screen app that focuses on mindful breathing exercises on the go. 

Pause and Focus on your Breath : Just Breathe

Use the app to take guided breathing exercises and breath training. Just select the preset and start. You can even customize it.

- Just one screen, 
- No analytics and no complex features. 
- Take breathing exercises from wherever you are.

It is designed in a very intuitive way that you wont even need a video that tells you how to use it. 

Its Free Forever.
No ads, no In-App purchases.

Mindful breathing happens when you focus on your breath. The inhale and the exhale.
Mindful breathing is a meditation tool to create a healthy and happy day for you
When we breathe, we donâ€™t generally focus on it as breathings are natural. We never learned to give our attention while breathing. Our app is designed to provide you with the time to focus on it.

This meditation scheme will make you feel relaxed. And most surprisingly, you only have to devote 5 minutes of your day to practice focused breathing. You will feel the difference after 5 minutes. ðŸ™ðŸ™ðŸ™

How to do breathing exercises:
 Find a quiet place to start
Sit comfortably while your spine should be erected
Set the intention to focus on your breathing
Start the app, and you will see it says breathe in, hold and breathe out
Focus on your breath as best as you can, let other thoughts to vanish
Try to synchronize your inhalation and exhalation with the breathing app
Keep practicing daily

Our mindful breathing app will help you when you are going through severe frustration, depression, anxiety, stress, and negative emotions. When you breathe mindfully, your body, mind, and brain become relaxed, and you gain more focus. When we are mindful, we do everything flawlessly.

Focused breathing practice is one of the things that will help you gain clarity of everything, a better perspective, and the best life.
Install our breathing app and practice these techniques to develop your peace of mind, focused brainpower, consciousness, compassion, and gratefulness.
Happy breathing. ðŸ˜‡ðŸ˜‡ðŸ˜‡

descriptionHTML:
Kata steht dir bei jeder Form der Inhalationstherapie wie eine gute Freundin zur Seite, indem sie
sich um deine AdhÃ¤renz kÃ¼mmert und misst, wie erfolgreich du deinen Inhalator oder Asthma-Spray ver-
wendest. Das macht die Therapie deiner Lungenkrankheit effektiver und hilft dir bei deiner Therapietreue!

>> FUNKTIONEN



- Schulung: Schritt-fÃ¼r-Schritt Anleitung fÃ¼r eine perfekte Inhalation mit unterstÃ¼tzenden Graï¬-
ken, einfachen Hinweisen und Veranschaulichung durch Augmented Reality (AR).

lief prima und was kÃ¶nnte noch ein wenig Ãœbung gebrauchen? Mit Kata ï¬ndest du es heraus!

lÃ¶ser deines Asthmas vorherzusagen. Therapieren mit Blick in die Zukunft.

ptome, Ursachen, Risikofaktoren und vieles mehr.

ches Beï¬nden. Statistiken geben dir einen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber den Verlauf deiner Werte und Inhalationen.

>> ENTWICKELT MIT MODERNER TECHNIK



Kata vereinfacht die Therapie von Lungenerkrankungen wie Asthma oder COPD maÃŸgeblich durch den Ein-
satz moderner Technik. So wird dem Nutzer zum Beispiel mithilfe von Augmented Reality (AR), vi-
suell greifbares und individuelles Feedback zur korrekten Handhabung beim Inhalieren gegeben.

Und dank Machine Learning (ML) kann das Verhalten der Nutzer analysiert werden, ohne das ein
medizinischer Experte unterstÃ¼tzen muss, indem mithilfe von Algorithmen, Muster im Inhalationsverhalten
des Nutzers erkannt und interpretiert werden.

title: MedM Health
description:
MedM Health is the Ultimate Health Diary for you and your family.

Whether you keep a Blood Sugar or Blood Pressure diary, tracking COPD conditions, heading to your Weight Loss achievements, or monitoring Temperature, MedM Health is a perfect companion for you.

You can collect data automaticaly from Fitness and Medical Devices or enter data manualy with our user friendly Smart Entry.

For those who donâ€™t like registrations, logins and passwords we implemented and fully function offline mode. 

For those whoâ€™d like to backup, share, export and get print friendly reports we offer a powerful MedM Health portal - https://health.medm.com

Measurements

Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Weight, Temperature, Heart Rate, Fetal Doppler, Blood Oxygen (SpO2), ECG,  Spirometry, Activity and Sleep Tracking, Notes.

Sensors

MedM is an absolute leader in Connected Health. Our apps are compatible with a huge variety of Smart Fitness and Medical Devices equipped with Bluetooth, NFC and ANT+ connectivity. 

MedM Apps are compatible with devices of the following vendors:

A&D Medical, Aerotel, Beets BLU, Biolight, CGS Sensors, ChoiceMMed, Contec, Creative Industry, DigiO2, eHealthSource, Entra Health Systems Co. Ltd., ERT, Fora Care Inc., H3 system, I.E.M., iChoice, Indie Health, Jerry Medical, Jiacom, Jumper Medical, Kinetik Wellbeing,  Leicke, LuckCome, Masimo, MicroLife, Mio Global, MIR, Mobile Action, Nonin, Omron, Oregon Scientific, Oxitone , Perlong, Philips, Polymap Wireless, ProbeTec, Pyle Audio, Ridian, Roche,  Rycom, SD Biosensor, Shecare, Shenzhen Pump Medical, SmartLAB, SRM, Sybercare, TaiDoc, Tanita, TigraSport, Transtek, Trividia Health, Visomat, Vitagoods, Vitalograph, Wahoo, Waveguider, Xporti, Zephyr Technology, 


MedM apps and services are available for all mobile platforms: Android, iOS, Windows Phone. 

Being connected to MedM Health Cloud you can access, backup, and share your data with your family, friends, and physicians.

MedM - Enabling Connected Health!

recentChanges:
Communication issue fixed for some Activity Trackers (AT100/405A0/Kinetik)
If your activity tracker has any synchronization issues please unpair and pair it again.
comments: Good app. I am not using other apps or technology and input everything manually. I'd like to input an activity that I can name myself (eg yoga, abs) and the amount of min I do this (I don't count my steps!). I'd also like larger periods over which I can see an overview of my measurements (eg year), better even if these can be compared (eg BP & activity. Last, would it be possible to have a (large enough) scroll bar so I can scroll down quickly to years earlier. Will give 5* with improvements!!

Inconsistent sync with Google Fit, all the information from Google Fit is off, Sleep is not synced with Google Fit (I track my sleep and there is plenty of data in my Google Fit cloud every day but none of it ever synced with MedM). No Berrymed oximeter devices listed. I wish I could use this app but currently I can't rely on it. I am adding a star in advance to help developers in dealing with vendors and ask for more ways of export (like generating a pdf to send to doctor from within the app).

I complained about the app not working with my kinetic band. I was told it had been sorted. It hasnt I've tried over and over to sync but despite the app saying it has synced it hasn't. Ive tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times to no avail. So im uninstalling again. Waste of time.
After syncing with the scales it leaves a non dismissable notification on the phone. He only way to get rid of it is to restart the phone.

I Have used it for years now. Mostly pretty good as far as I can make out. Only issue is, it says I only have 39% muscle mass. Which doesn't add up. I'm 5'10, 93kgs, and I am mostly muscle. So I cant figure it out. Lol

title: Box Breathing - Breath Air
description:
"Discover the world of box breathing and other breathing exercises with the BreathAir app. Our techniques will allow you to benefit from the power of conscious control of this most basic bodily function.
It no matters if you are looking for more relaxation and calm, getting a better and more effective rest during night ,or you are an athlete focused on improving results â€“ particular breathing techniques will help you to achieve  that goals. What is more, box breathing can be used complimentary to the other relaxing, breathing, meditation and mindfullness apps as well.
We also want to remind that at the beginning of their journey Wim Hof method enthustiasts are supposed to learn how to adapt cold by deep breathing. Welcome all cold fans, we have a tool for you.  
How does it work?
Box Breathing is also known as ""resetting your breath"" or four-square breathing. It is very easy to learn, and can be used by anyone.
Just download our app, set up the breathing method,sit comfortably in your chair and let us guide you through the all proces. Thatâ€™s it, thatâ€™s all.
What does it do?
Reduces physical stress symptoms in the body
Increases mental clarity, energy, and focus
Useful in correcting kids minderable structure 
One of  the methods in asthma control
Helps increasing sport results (Improve delivery of oxygen to organs and working muscles- check oxygen advantage  method)
"

developerAddress: ul. Franciszka Kawy 36/21, 01-496 Warsaw, Poland
comments: I used to really enjoy this app but recently the vibrating function isn't functioning the way it used to. I primarily use the vibrating feature and just have the phone lie next to me. Before it would vibrate once for each action (inhale, hold, exhale) but now it vibrates twice when it's on hold, confusing you to whether it's moving on to the next action or not. I'm not sure if this is due to the new update or not but I hope it can be fixed! Besides that it's great!

overall a good app, but could do with a few tweaks (1) maybe a start timer give a you chance to prepare. (2) a visual general timer to know how far you are in the exercise (3) some way of the knowing that exercise has finished (4) need ad free version (5) off line version, do all these & you'll get 5 stars, keep up the good work

I downloaded this app after reading about the benefits of breathing exercises. This is a well designed app that not only guides you through breathing exercises but provides information about them. Clean and easy layout. Good work.

This app is very simple to use and by doing the exercises every day one can actually feel different. In my personal experience, I have noticed how my stress levels have been reduced and I have been able to cope with my day to day life (now with the COVID 19) in a healthy way. Just by breathing in a certain way one can improve our state of mind. Thank you for the person/s who created this amazing app
Some bugs beed to be fixed please fix it very quickly as it is important to me and everyone

title: Toon Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

â— Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
â— Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
â— Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
â— Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
â— Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
â— Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
â— Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
â— Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

developerAddress: Turkey
recentChanges:
PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS!
Toon Blast introduces the Gelato Runaway episode with 50 new levels!
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content.
Come and join the fun!
comments: It starts out as a really fun and challenging game, until you advance to higher levels. It becomes nearly impossible to win certain levels without money, boosters or making purchases. No one likes impossible odds. You continually lose on a level just 1 or 2 moves away from winning. So very frustrating! The more you play, the more you realize, there's no skill or strategy, there's not even chance. The game is anything but random: it's totally controlled and manipulated by the game's programming.

I like the game and how challenging the levels are, but the reason for the rating is that it sucks that the only way to save progress is by signing in with Facebook. I'm not a fan of Facebook and wish there was other options to sign in like Candy Crush has. The rewards could be way better the higher you move up the level not the same as the first 20 levels.

Loved playing this game and did so for quite some time. I got permanently banned because of I was accused of cheating. I was using 2 names. I however, wasnt using both. My grandchildren were. So my advice to all is dont use more than 1 name. Lesson learned. Never would have done that if I knew. Read the rules folks. This is an awesome game though and I will miss it horribly.

A little advice about this game. I have been playing for 2 years now.Been hearing how difficult this game is. I have learned to take my time on difficult level's. Their is no time line to complete a game. With knowing this I am able to figure out the difficult level's. I find this game challenging but rewarding. If it becomes hard just take a break and return when ready. Don't give up. The hard levels aren't impossible. Maranatha!!

This game is addictive because of the teams. When it gets too difficult; and it does; you'll find it necessary to buy boosters with real money. ...It sucks when you can't contribute to your team during the tournaments. Don't fall for the free coins, and unlimited lives scam, that will show up in team chat. I'd give this game five stars, but it's too difficult (to do soðŸ˜‰).

title: Flo Health & Period tracker. My Ovulation Calendar
description:
Over 130 million women around the globe have already chosen Flo as their menstrual calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy assistant!

Flo is a smart and simple feminine menstrual cycle calendar and  PMS symptom tracker, accurate ovulation calculator and helpful pregnancy tracker. The app Flo Period Tracker not only  accurately tracks your cycle and flow intensity,  but is also a sensitive regular and irregular period tracker, reliable trying to conceive app, ovulation calendar, and true fertility friend for you. Flo period diary makes accurate predictions of menstruation, ovulation and fertile days. Itâ€™s the first free period tracking app for Android, pregnancy calculator, fertility calendar, ovulation calendar for womÐµn that uses machine learning (AI). All women, even those with irregular period, can rely on this health tracker. Log your menstruation days & flow intensity in a handy period calendar (menstrual cycle diary), ovulation tracker and fertility calculator, schedule menstrual cycle reminders, record moods and PMS symptoms, use a due date calculator, follow a pregnancy calendar and take full control of your health with the app.
Want to know when your next period is coming? Confused by PMS symptoms? Want to take your birth control pills in time? With this free female period tracker, ovulation calculator and fertility calendar itâ€™s easy to keep track of your menstrual cycle.

FREE PERIOD DIARY & OVULATION CALENDAR & FERTILITY CALENDAR (CALCULATOR) FOR WOMEN AND TEENS
Download this period and ovulation tracking app and:
â€¢ Track your cycle, period days and PMS with the period calendar for Android
â€¢ Log the start and the end date of menstruation, flow intensity and fertile days in the period calendar
â€¢ Track your fertility window (fertile days) and when do you ovulate to see your chance to get pregnant with the ovulation predictor
â€¢ Analyze your current and past cycles, menstrual flow with the menstrual tracker
â€¢ Get predictions for upcoming periods, ovulation days, and fertility with the period calendar
â€¢ Log ovulation tests results (positive ovulation, negative ovulation) in the app for Android
â€¢ Track basal temperature with the period calendar
â€¢ Log pregnancy tests results in the app for Android
â€¢ Log more symptoms to get improved period predictions if you have irregular periods

PREGNANCY CALCULATOR (PREGNANCY CALENDAR) & TRACKER
â€¢ See countdown to the birth of the baby
â€¢ Track the week of pregnancy
â€¢ Pick and change your pregnancy week by week
â€¢ Get interesting articles on pregnancy every day

LIFESTYLE & FITNESS TRACKER
â€¢ Add your weight, water consumption every day
â€¢ Log your physical activity every day in the app for Android
â€¢ Track your sex drive and moods every day
â€¢ Log your PMS symptoms in the period calendar app

REMINDERS
â€¢ Schedule reminders and get notifications of your period, ovulation days and fertility
â€¢ Get reminders to log weight, sleep and to drink water every day
â€¢ Get reminders on medication and contraception depending on your contraception type

GRAPHS
â€¢ Keep your period, menstrual flow, ovulation, fertility and symptoms history

MEDICAL AND SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE

summary: Plan your well-being journey: menstrual calendar,fertility & pregnancy tracker
developerAddress: 1013 Centre Road, Suite 403-B, Wilmington, DE, 19805
recentChanges:
Discover our biggest update ever â€” Flo 5.0.
Take your health and well-being to the next level with the app used by 140 million women.
Explore more accurate AI-based cycle predictions and a daily well-being plan that includes tailored, practical health insights with cycle- and hormone-based tips for clearer skin, better workouts, and more energy. Explore a new health library co-created with 50+ leading doctors and health experts.
Enjoy! If you like our app, please donâ€™t hesitate to review us.
comments: I used to love this app. It helped me get diagnosed with Endo after I read one of the helpful articles on irregular periods. Unfortunately, everything has been locked behind their premium membership paywall. All the helpful articles are gone, replaced only with endless prompts to buy their memberships. And so, I too must move on. I understand the need to make money, but for those of us who can't afford it, its merely the nail in the coffin.

I've been able to track my period, ovulation, and even my pregnancy...very useful app! Update: I still love the app and its content. However, it has been difficult trying to change my pregnancy info. I had to uninstall and reinstall the app and there were still some issues as the app tends to save prerecorded data. Also, I would love it if I could log personal notes and reminders. This can be done somewhat using the calender feature but only after that specific date has come or passed.

I've been using this app for over 2 years now and it was great back then. Ever since they upgraded and got premium the user experience has gone down so much. I just like to log and track things and it used to be so quick and easy but every 5 seconds now you get prompted with an 'upgrade to premium' 'look at this premium feature' to the point where it takes so long to just try to mark one thing. You have great content, but when I hit X on something I expect it to close and not keep popping up

Used to really like this app. All of the information was great! Now unfortunately you don't get anything but the tracker unless you pay. I am already paying through the nose for doctors visits and tests to try to get pregnant and unfortunately this just isn't an expense I can justify. I understand the "subscription" income is used to "improve" the app but I feel that myself and a few others would be happier to watch a few adds and still have access. The tracker is accurate most of the time.

ETA: I don't know how others are able to get an option to log menstrual cup use. I've been using it for months and haven't seen that. It's pretty disappointing I have been using My Calendar for a good few years, and it's alright. Flo is great. I love all the information available and actually enjoy the "chats" to learn more about my cycle and my body. I also love how pretty it is, lol. I will definitely recommend it to friends.

title: Fitbit
description:
Start a free 90-day trial of Fitbit Premium for personalized guidance, customized health programs and 240+ video workouts you can do at home. 

Say hello to one of the worldâ€™s leading apps for health and fitness. Use the Fitbit app on itâ€™s own to join our community, track basic stats and stay motivated on your journey. Or, get a Fitbit tracker or smartwatch to see how your activity, workouts, sleep, nutrition and stress all fit together. Either way, youâ€™ll find the information and inspiration you need to reach your goalsâ€”all in one place. 

A free app that tracks your day & progress over time
Find free workouts, nutrition programs, meditation tracks, sleep tools & more 
Connect with friends, start challenges & join an inspiring community
Set goals, earn achievement badges & celebrate milestones
Automatically sync your data to 3,000+ popular partner apps
Access innovative smartwatch apps & fresh clock faces 
Works with all Fitbit trackers, smartwatches, scales & other Fitbit products
 
GET ACTIVE: See how small moves add up by using your smartphone to track steps and distance. Or pair with a Fitbit tracker or smartwatch to see all-day stats like steps, distance, calories burned, floors climbed and active minutes. 

WORK OUT FROM HOME: Access free video and audio workouts that you can do on your time, right from your living room. Youâ€™ll find sessions for HIIT, cardio, strength, yoga and more. Plus, start a 90-day free trial of Fitbit Premium to unlock 240+ workouts from popular brands like barre3, Daily Burn, POPSUGAR and Yoga Studio: Mind & Body.

SLEEP BETTER: Discover how long and how well youâ€™re sleeping, then improve your nightly routine with Fitbitâ€™s innovative sleep toolsâ€”including a nightly Sleep Score, sleep goal setting, bedtime reminders and graphs that show your time in light, deep and REM sleep.

MANAGE STRESS: Listen to free audio tracks to lessen your stress and improve your mood. Use mindfulness to start your day a better way, find moments of calm and set intentions with meditation or get help falling asleep with stories and relaxing sounds.  

EAT SMARTER: Keep your nutrition in check with easy-to-use tools to set goals, log food and water, track calories in and out and see if youâ€™re getting enough protein, fat and carbs. For more personalized programs to help you reach weight and nutrition goals, try Fitbit Premium.

TRACK HEART RATE: Understand your overall health by using your watch or tracker to record your heart rate 24/7. In the app, find valuable data like resting heart rate trends, time spent in heart rate zones during workouts and a cardio fitness score.

recentChanges: *Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Like everyone else. I used to love my Fitbit. I have a Charge 2. Since the last couple updates, it wont sync, doesn't record my activity or my sleep. It doesnt record that I hit my activity goal for the day. I am constantly restarting the fitbit and my phone to try to get it to sync. I liked it the way it was before. The new updates are horrible. I refuse to pay for premium. I will switch products if I have to.

Doesn't sync a lot of time. Therefore it may be two days before shows you what your looking for. I have uninstalled and re installed to get it to do what is expected. Not. Alexa very seldom works so I gave up on that. Fitbit keeps pushing the "Premuim", why would I spend money for that when I cant even get basic to work. When it works it is great, and then I'm real happy. I have the Versa 2 fitbit.

The app no longer automatically syncs with my watch. I have to force it to sync up multiple times a day and even then, it takes ages "looking" for my device which is always switched on and right next to the phone... I also don't get message or call notifications anymore. My device will be 2 years old in December, and I can tell you, I won't be bothering buying a new Fitbit product.

10/18: AGAIN with the syncing issues. It's been 5 days and my watch and phone will not synch. This happens way too often. Please figure this out Fitbit! August 2020: Fitbit, As I can see I'm not the only one with synching and connecting issues. Whatever the problem is, fix it and fix it fast. We've paid a lot of money for a smartwatch with features that aren't working. I've tried all the tricks, disconnecting and reconnecting Bluetooth, restarting my phone, etc. and nothing is working.

It no longer tracks my runs correctly. The map feature only shows a line for about 300 yards and then abruptly stops. The paces are also hilariously low. I'm flattered Fitbit thinks I can run as fast as it says I do. Ever since Fitbit was bought out, it's gone steeply downhill. Don't bother with them anymore. Update: now it's urging me to vote, which I truly don't understand, given it's a fitness app. You'd think they could spend some time fixing bugs such as the one described above instead...

title: Calculate by QxMD
description:
From the maker of the apps 'Read', 'The ECG Guide' and 'Pedi STAT' comes 'Calculate', a next-generation medical calculator and decision support tool, freely available to the medical community.

Also available on the web at http://qxmd.com/calculate

Essential tools in General Practice, Internal Medicine, Cardiology, Surgery, Obstetrics, Nephrology, Hematology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, Gastroenterology, Neurology, Neurosurgery, Respirology, and more.

"We recommend medical users try the free Calculate by QxMD first..."
-from iMedicalApps review "The best free Medical Calculator apps"

'Calculate' is focused on highlighting tools which are actually useful in clinical practice and serve to impact diagnosis, treatment or determining prognosis.

Helping you make decisions, not just calculate numbers...

Features

â€¢ Developed by a collaboration of clinician experts from diverse backgrounds
â€¢ Converts recent research publications into practical handheld tools - knowledge translation at its best
â€¢ Automatically adapts to your self-described clinical practice
â€¢ Unique â€˜Question Flowâ€™ technology gets you answers, fast
â€¢ Detailed references with Pubmed integration
â€¢ Comprehensive and insightful results
â€¢ Elegant design and intuitive interface
â€¢ SI and Conventional units

More than 300 unique calculators and decision support tools

While too extensive to list them all, here is a small sampling of included content:

Reduce and predict perioperative complications

â€¢ WHO Surgical Safety Checklist
â€¢ Predictive models for cardiac surgery and coronary angiography

Guide treatment

â€¢ Determine cardiovascular risk and guide lipid treatment using the Framingham and Reynolds Risk Scores
â€¢ Use the CHA2DS2-VASc score to guide treatment in atrial fibrillation
â€¢ Better understand the risk of bleeding from anticoagulation in atrial fibrillation
â€¢ ACS using the TIMI risk score
â€¢ Burns with rule of 9s and Parkland formula
â€¢ Hypernatremia (calculate water deficit)

Determine Prognosis

â€¢ Heart failure
â€¢ Lymphoma
â€¢ Myelodysplastic Syndrome
â€¢ Myeloma
â€¢ Glomerulonephritis
â€¢ Hemodialysis
â€¢ COPD
â€¢ TIA
â€¢ Pancreatitis

Calculate

â€¢ Ideal body weight, BMI and BSA
â€¢ Due date and gestational age
â€¢ Extensive formula used in echocardiogropathy and invasive hemodynamic monitoring
â€¢ Kt/V in dialysis patients
â€¢ eGFR with CKD-EPI, Cockcroft-Gault and MDRD
â€¢ A-a gradient

Classify
â€¢ Angina (CCS)
â€¢ Congestive heart failure (NYHA)

Manage
â€¢ Head, neck, ankle and knee injuries
â€¢ DVT and PE
â€¢ Pulmonary nodules

Stage
â€¢ Lung cancer
â€¢ Renal cell carcinoma

Understand
â€¢ TTKG (transtubular potassium gradient) in hypokalemia and hyperkalemia
â€¢ Dermatomes

Diagnose
â€¢ Heparin Induced Thrombocytopenia
â€¢ Infective Endocarditis
â€¢ ARDS
â€¢ Autoimmune Hepatitis

And much more...

 
Want to keep up with medical research?  Get 'Read by QxMD' for Android: 
http://qx.md/read

Founded my medical professionals, QxMD is dedicated to creating high quality, point-of-care tools for practicing health care professionals. Recognized as a leading developer of free medical software for mobile devices, QxMD develops content in cooperation with expert physicians from their respective fields.
