developerAddress:
Room 3306-12, 33/F, Shui On Centre
6-8 Hong Kong Road
Wanchai, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. ðŸ˜­

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

Play thousands of candy puzzle games for free, with new puzzles every week so you never run out of challenging jelly games to play!

Swap candy colored treats and crush delicious cookies and cakes. Itâ€™s no wonder people say Cookie Jam is the BEST MATCH 3 GAME EVER! We have thousands of match 3 games and candy puzzle games to enjoy! Each cookie puzzle comes jam-packed with candy matching fun and jelly matching thrills!

Chef Panda has an order to fill and you can help. Connect three or more treats to fill orders and push through levels in this relaxing swapping game. Match 5 treats to wipe the board clean with a powerful cake crush booster. Discover countless new levels and collect awesome boosters in the ultimate match three game online.

KEY INGREDIENTS:
ðŸª Free to play cookie matching fun for everyone!
ðŸª Never-ending fun with THOUSANDS of unique levels with new ones added weekly

You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your bakery adventure on this free match three game today!

recentChanges: The harvest season has arrived in Cookie Jam! Come join us with this sweet update including new levels, events, and more!
comments: Love the game but shouldn't have to pay for more coins. Should get them on the wheel sometimes. Never do. Free play time clock should stop until you get back to play. Can't play 24 hours straight. I want to, but humanly impossible. Fix that please. Thank you for responding! I got the coins on my last spin. Great! Still need to fix the free play we get. I had several hours but fell asleep before I could play. Lost the remaining time. Please fix that. Thanks!!!!

The constant attempts to sell you more lives and game time is beyond annoying. Also, games seemingly are programmed for you to lose with only one move left, trying to frustrate you into buying more moves. Update: Sure, you don't have to purchase additional game time or moves, but I could also walk from Chicago to New York all without having to pay for gas, bus fare, or a plane ticket. Just like I will eventually arrive at my destination, I will also eventually complete the game level.

I have had this game for awhile, but recently it's become frustrating that lives do not regenerate. I will play at night, run out of lives, and the next morning there are still 0 lives. Sometimes I can restart my phone and it resolves, other times, nothing works. It's only a fun game when you can actually play it. :(

Used to love this game, until it became a money eater. Not really as much fun now, especially since the pandemic, when I don't have the extra money, try to play for a stress reliever, Not more stress. Now won't even give daily bonus even if You log in Every Day, when You get so far, it cuts You Off because You won't pay for more, SAD...

Love this game! â¤ ever since update, you don't receive extra spins and always get the same things. You very seldom receive the coins. Now its even harder to win the new air ships. I haven't won a new since July, just not fun like it use to be. Now you have win 30 levels to win an Air Ship. Not fun at all...you do the Cookie walk no coins, and again no extra spins. Really thinking about getting rid of the game. So disappointing.

comments: This company keeps dulling down this game in order to have players watch more ads and making the game harder to play. I'm now on level 1539 and every day I have to watch numerous ads in order to progress in the game. This is a fun game but the developer is making this game worse with every update. 1 star.

This game is trash when you reach a certain level. It purposefully gives you the wrong color bubbles when there's only color changing bubbles left on the board so you have to use your boosters and watch commercials. Time to uninstall.
I used to love this game but since the latest update released on 29 October, the beam shot no longer works properly. It is only destroying the bubbles you can see on the screen and not to the top.

It's a good game for a while. After a bit, though, it gets to the point where the levels are too hard to beat without 4 or 5 tries. There's no way to lessen or in any way control the difficulty level. It would be nice if there were a way to choose your difficulty level that you wanted to play each day. This set up, though just has you on one track that gets harder by the level.

The issue with getting not getting the colored right ball to progress through the level is still happening. Please make the rainbow ball more useful. I'm in the 100s level and these balls with the ? are annoying and unhelpful and makes it harder to get three stars since the last ball on that level keeps changing colors. The balls with the "-" are annoying. On the first level with it it's impossible not to pop especially with blaster. Also the previous issues have not been fixed.

title: Kitten Match
description:
How can you refuse a helpless sweet kitten when she looks into your eyes? Help and care for the kitten, design, and decorate apartments by solving match 3 puzzles!

Welcome to Kitten Match! Here you can design and decorate the mansion with lovely talking cats by solving match-3 puzzles. If you think this is not fun enough, donâ€™t worry, feed cats, dress them up and play with them, etc, we have what beyond your imagination! Come and join us now, cats are waiting for you!

Every sweet kitten deserves a nice human. Take care of the adorable kittens, restore mansions and adventure in the world of match 3 games!  Your beloved kitties will always be by your side!

Successful of beating colorful match 3 levels deliver you food, suits for the cats and materials that you can renovate your mansion. The more chapters you can unlock, the bond with your sweet kitten is more tightly! Donâ€™t hesitate, meet your cute kitten pal and start your journey!

The game features: 
â—Storyline: Decorate your mansions with your sweet kitten pal and encounter other cat friends!
â—House design: Lights, furniture, wallpapers, floors, all on your decisions! You are the master of remodeling!
â—Care for cats: feed kittens and dress them up! Pet cute cats and enjoy their purring!
â—Exciting match 3 levels: challenge the puzzles, make powerful boosters, and blast gems!
â—Communicate and compete with your Facebook friends! You can also send and receive free additional lives to/from them! 

Make yourself and your little kitten a cozy home and give them a feeling of family!  Thousands of pieces of furniture give you the freedom to inspire creativity and remodel when you want. Cuddly kittens will be proud of you!


Kitten Match is free to play, though some virtual items can also be purchased for real money.   

Having fun in Kitten Match? Follow us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kittenmatch/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support team at kittenmatch_support@qiyi.com

comments: I really like it. It has a fun storyline, nice decor choices and overall a nice game. Its addictive and its cute. The cats are adorable and I love how you meet new ones as the story goes on. I really do like the idea of having a cat area built just for the cats and how people can come visit and like it. It's a fun, cute and addictive game and I really enjoy it.

I love the challenge! It surprised me that Kitten Match isn't a game geared for children. The levels start out easy but they get challenging as you win and move up to higher levels. The story line is adorable and there are many different facets in the game. It's kept me interested and actually looking forward to play it and help the kittens with a variety of tasks. Try it... you'll like it too!

Although this is one of my fave games which I only started playing in the last week and the story with the kittens is really adorable they just make it too freaking hard if you have no boosters to get through a level. Can't buy anything on this phone as I use my graphics handle so I'm like stuck and have no way to get any boosters when I really need them. I'm just devastated because I really really love the story and the renovation aspect of this game.

This is a fun game. I'm not a mad fan of matching games but this one plays fair. Rewards are generous, there is no constant stream of ads and decorating is fun. Not does it cheat - if you have to use coins to extend a game you usually only have to do it once. Graphics are good and the cats are cute. I like it.

Love playing the game. Love the cats and their costumes. The ads are not annoying. Just wish that when you play multiple boards that your bombs, ball etc. Would be able to go to next board. Also wish that it was easier to get rewards, some puzzles need more moves or if at the end of no more moves that if there are balls, bombs, line cleaners etc, that they could do a last blast. I am looking forward for the next update .

title: WeAreMore: Find a Therapist + Free Peer Support
description:
Find-a-Therapist: Easily find your perfect Therapist. Transparent pricing, confirmed availability, distance from you measurement, Online and in-person options. Filter therapists based on Cost, Distance, Specialty, Languages etc.

Find the best-rated Therapists in your neighborhood or Virtual. Your choice. No Contracts, no commitments. Try a therapist and get 50% off the first visit. 

Support App built exclusively for mental and chronic disease patients. Recommended by Mental health America, crisis hotlines, and over 100 doctor offices in the country. 

Find a Therapist: Find therapists in your neighborhood or virtual with ease. Sort listings based on Rates, Specializations, Distance, Languages, and more. Get 50% off the first session for any therapist. 
PLUS
Get support from peers who understand your health conditions. Get motivated with Gratitude posts. Share & search for peer-recommended doctors and hospitals. Express yourself with creative highlights about your health. Tons of other features keep you engrossed in an empathetic environment.  

Addiction support groups: (smoking, addiction, alcohol, opioids)
Mental health support groups: (PTSD, Borderline Personality Disorder, Depression, Anxiety, Schizophrenia, Bipolar disorder, addiction, eating disorder)
Diabetes support groups: (T1D, T2D, Pre-diabetes)
Cancer support groups: (Breast cancer, Prostate cancer, Skin cancer, Colon cancer, Lung cancer, Brain cancer, Leukemia, Lymphoma, Ovarian, other cancer) 
Cardiac (Heart disease, Heart failure)
Chronic Pain support groups: (Fibromyalgia, Lupus (SLE), Arthritis, Crohn's/colitis, Neuropathy)
Neurologic (Alzheimerâ€™s, Dementia, Parkinsonâ€™s, ALS, MS, Migraine, Seizures, Stroke)
Relationship chat groups: (Marital, Family)
Pediatric support groups: (Parenting, Autism, ADHD, Cerebral Palsy, Cystic Fibrosis)
HIV & Hepatitis C support groups: (HIV, Hep C)
Respiratory: Asthma, COPD, Emphysema

Blog: https://wearemore.life/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wearemoreapp

Have an idea for improvement in the app? Let us know! Email us at support@wearemore.life

comments: Sketchy af. Tried to sign up normally... says you need to be at least 18... without any option to add age. Tried using a Google account to which you are told you need to allow it access to your google drive. Then you get a lovely little error message just when you think you're done. Yeah, because that's TOTALLY a normal thing that apps ask for access to. Cool concept, failed execution.

well I like the app but the user interface isn't very user friendly and the app keeps crashing on me for no apparent reason I'm using a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 I try to comment or post something but the entire app just stops usually before I can finish typing anything, I cannot identify any specific trigger for the crashes. app needs an update, it's been since November 2018 without 1

Would like to be able to reply to other messages on a post. Perhaps we should be able to follow people to receive notifications from them? Or just hve a notification bell im general, in case that person is...not doing so well, just to give advice and support. Also...perhaps insert some games? Nothing too big...card games and what not...some people feel as tho it is just either a little too depressing or a little too quiet within the app sometimes...

pro's and con's like most things.not much use to users outside the U.S but pretty good for American users.there are users on this app asking for money but then there are some genuine users who need and can give support.the app support is limited to be nice,a total joke to be honest.in my humble opinion i think this app is seriously flawed and the developers do not seem interested in fixing the problems.in general,id say the app is a great idea....but only if they make it work properly some day.
I am finding it very difficult to load, it takes a long time. I can't retrieve messages or see updates very well. It's running and loading frequently. Can this be fixed?

comments: Its fun but not honest. There's an option where you spin to play. You can put in like $100,000 with the chance of winning $1 billion but that never happens. I played 20 rounds last night on this option and the only thing I got was double what I put in. And if that was the only option that would be ok but the way they advertise it is just a joke. You can also get free spins and you get the bare minimum on any of these also.

The game has become that bogged down with a dire amount of pop ups at startup to encourage you to spend obscene amounts of money in game that it rarely starts up without a hitch or crashing.... Don't believe the scripted response they post about their RNG, it's rigged plain and simple weighted towards those that spend or to get you to spend, far from random as the majority will lay testament to if you read the honest reviews on here...

Awful. Pointlessly cheating algorithm. No point in playing as you will lose. Plenty of far better poker apps that don't manipulate the game. And to pre-empt the standard cut and paste reply from the developers : the hands dealt in the first few rounds certainly were fixed - and blatantly so.

High level players playing on beginner tables going all-in on every hand before the flop! It's not very enjoyable. Edit: response to developers response; the problem is the high level player's that are joining the beginner levels (where I am) that make it impossible for beginners to enjoy themselves because the sharks are constantly going all in, so the beginners can't even learn the game or build up their bank. A level 160 shouldn't be at the same table as a level 12 (unless they are friends).

This app is horrible it always kicks me out of the app and usually when I'm in the middle of a game and get a winning hand. Sometimes it won't let me bet and folds for me and the players with the higher level always win majority of the time. ***every since i wrote this review now it won't even let me join a table it just kicks me out of the app completely. This game sucks

title: Breathing Problems Treatment
description:
Breathing Problems Treatment is aplikas something that we do automatically to stay alive and so most of us do not think twice about it. It is perfectly natural to breathe through the mouth at certain terms such as when running or lifting heavy objects, however if breathing occurs through the mouth habitually then it can lead to many health problems. These problems can be particularly severe for children as mouth breathing can affect the long term development of the face and jaw.


 In this app we will discuss:

asthma
shortness of breath
breathing problems
copd treatment
trouble breathing
lung problems
difficulty breathing

feature on the app

_ update once a week
_ useful tips that you will provide
_ a very simple look in the app.


little explanation about Breathing Problems Treatment : 

It is estimated that almost 80% of people suffer from a deviated nasal septum and Septoplasty is one treatment which has been helping them overcome the problems caused by it. Nasal septum is a wall like lining in the nose which separates the cavities of the nose into two equal halves. Ideally this wall should be in the midline of the nose thereby making equal passages on the right and left sides. The nasal septum consists of a central cartilage which provides support and is covered with mucus membrane on both sides. If this septum is not in the midline of the nose or is deviated, it can cause severe breathing problems.

Causes, Symptoms and Effects

Nasal septum deviation can be caused either through some injury to the nose or it can even be present by birth. Excessive growth of the skeleton system can also be a reason for deviated septum and cause the nasal passages to be blocked. Some of the most common symptoms of a deviated nasal septum are blockages in either one or both nostrils, obstructed breathing, nasal congestions, chronic sinus, infections, bleeding of the nose, snoring, breathing through the mouth, headaches and facial pain.

People suffering from deviated nasal septum often complain about breathing obstruction, congestion, headaches and sinusitis troubles. This deviation can significantly obstruct the flow of air from the nasal passage as well as not allow a nose to be completely clear of the sinus and mucus drainage. In extreme cases, the deviation could also affect the outward structure of the nose causing it to alter shape and leave the nose looking collapsed. In such cases, Rhinoplasty - a type of cosmetic surgery is the only way to correct it.

How Septoplasty works

Septoplasty is the most effective treatment for correcting a deviated nasal septum. This process is conducted via the nostrils, thereby ensuring that there are no bruises and no signs of surgery. The procedure involves realigning the portion of cartilage or bone which is bent in the nasal cavity. Local or general anaesthesia administered before the process and an incision is made via the nostrils on the septum to reach the affected area. It is ensured that there is sufficient cartilage being preserved so that it can provide structural support to the nose. After aligning the septum to the correct position, it is given a temporary stability with the help of small plastic sutures. 

Septoplasty has helped a lot of patients to completely or partially eliminate the symptoms of deviated nasal septum. This procedure clears the blockage of the nose passage thereby allowing smooth breathing and clear nostrils. It also helps in avoiding any chronic infections or sinus that could have developed due to the obstruction as well as provides a structural support to the nose and preventing and facial damage

comments: It used to be good, but now I seem to have noticed that: The cue balls mysteriously bounce back out or don't go in when it is a clear shot. The power meter is a hit or miss-it doesn't shoot when you intend to and you then have to pull it again which then messes up the direction of your shot (half your time has gone by then). There are too many cheaters. Too many players abusing the connection function to waste time in the game. 8 Ball Pool Popups every few seconds are annoying.

Was having a good entertaining experience, when all of a sudden don't know for what reason all my progress just vanished. Tried to reach the developers but they have not responded till yet. My level which was 41suddenly backed to 5. All my winnings were gone. Was expecting a prompt help for the same. But it seems the developers are no more intrested in good reviews. I am really disappointed.

Love 8 ball pool !!! I loved the pool pass ,but couldn't afford to buy anything. But love playing for it. It's been updated a lot to improve it . That's a plus!!! I love 8 ball and 9 ball, but like others on here , some of the things happening are unbelievable, balls just hanging on the edge , the cue moving when it was aimed to shoot, and coins disappearing!!! And other players stealing your turn, and your coins. Please fix this stuff happening. A true patriot of 8 Ball Pool. Love it !!!

The game was good when I started playing it but now that I've progressed it's like your playing a robot, perfect shot, perfect english on the ball, every shot just perfect. Don't waste your money buying coins trying to advance quicker it doesn't help, you'll only lose them quicker and have to buy more. The weekend games are usually won by the same people if you watch the standings. A perfect bank shot will run off course like the table isn't level, did it today!!

Constantly hangs up. After an update the program became worse. It only allows me 2 seconds to play and then switches players. It does not record a ball made. It replayed the same player when i chose not to. It never allowed me to play, it hanged up for 3 minutes and it ended the game and the other player won. I'm ready to abandon this game. DO NOT INSTALL THIS GAME!

comments: I purchased a year subscription a couple months ago. It was great now in this last week it has so many glitches and each item doesn't want to open takes forever! And now they keep telling me I need to buy the upgraded version if I want to use something. I already did like I said I turned into the Developers, nothing has changed so far. I should have stuck with the free! You get one star because I had to give it to you!

Use to really like this app but now it's just slow so slow I had to wait five minutes for it to switch to another item. Use can use everything then when you finally get it the way you want and go to save it says it's premium and deletes your looks. Maybe you can be nicer to us who can't pay for premium and tell us what is premium instead of having us guess.

I've used this app for quite a very long time now, and not until recently (yesterday to be precise) did I notice that an update I choose to call *super*, is available. The old one was awesome, but this new one (updated one), is super awesome. Kudos to youcam makeup team, I love every part of this app. Please keep up the good work.ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

I really like this app it lets you try different eye shadows and hair colors plus fix whatever flaw you may feel you have about your face. Lots of preset makeup looks to select from. What do you have to lose for goodness sake, download and make yourself beautiful or just find what colors or different styles look good on you.

I love this app very much it has so many make up things to do so,i would like to tell every body to install this app it takes pictures also very nice my favourite camera is YouCam Makeup . I always use this app to take pictures my mother also love this app very much it dosen't have any side-effects also but when we go to look it need wifi or data to work so this app is so much fun every type of colours lipsitck,eyeliner , eyeshadho , founddation ......etc so from my side. Five 5 stars.to it.

title: Bumble â€“ Dating, Make New Friends & Business
description:
Welcome to Bumble, the app where women make the first move ðŸ¦¸â€â™€ï¸

More than 100 million boos have registered on Bumble to create meaningful relationships, find online friends and make purposeful connections. Bumble is a dating app that allows you to make new connections, whether youâ€™re looking for a partner in crime, a new friend to complete your group Halloween costume, or to expand your professional network spooky fast. 

Making the first move on Bumble could change your life! 

DISCOVER OUR AMAZING FEATURES
- Top Filters: Find your right date or next BFF and get an unforgettable first online encounter
- SuperSwipe: See someone you really like? Send a SuperSwipe to get their attention
- Spotlight: Get more visibility by putting yourself at the top of the stack for 30 minutes
- Travel: Match with amazing people around the world without leaving your home


CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME
Continue to enjoy dating as youâ€™ve always done, finding love or friends is as easy as pie on Bumble, but women always make the first move.

- Bumble is a free dating app to download and use based on respect, equality and inclusion
- On Heterosexual matches, women have 24h to start a chat and men have 24h to respond 
- Other matches have 24h to start a chat or reply before the match expires (We promise that no one turns into a pumpkin after the match expires ðŸŽƒ)
- We offer the possibility to meet people in different fields with our 3 modes, Date, BFF and Bizz


WEâ€™RE NOT JUST FOR DATING ANYMORE
Weâ€™re the first app that combines the possibility to date, flirt or find your new boyfriend or girlfriend, meet new friends and make professional connections in one single app.

- Use Video Chat to make or respond to a first move and to know your matches better
- Send your videos and favourite pictures while you are chatting with new people
- Hide your profile with the Snooze Mode for as long as you want (youâ€™ll still keep all your matches, because no one likes a ghost ðŸ‘»)
- Link your Spotify and Instagram account to make friends and get more dates


BOOST YOUR DATES THIS HALLOWEEN WITH PREMIUM
-  See everyone who has right-swiped you (your Beeline)
-  Extend your matches by 24 hours
-  Rematch with expired connections
-  Unlock SuperSwipe, Spotlight and Travel to make the most of your profile


THE BUZZ IS REAL
Bumble is much more than just a dating app, enter the truly inclusive dating community, discover single people who are looking for the same thing as you and find that ideal partner who will make you swoon. This is our commitment to our core values:

- We believe healthy relationships are fundamental to living a productive and positive life.
- We fight against old-fashioned heterosexual relationship habits, women always take the first step. 
- We've reformed the rules of the game to change the dynamics of dating. 



---
Bumble is free to download and use and always will be! However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Bumble Boost) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (BumbleCoins).

https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms

comments: Filters don't work at all when you set them (ex height, distance, etc.) After a few swipes, you're not allowed to swipe for the day. This app is annoying and needs to be updated as it has a lot of potential! I don't even know how many right swipes I get! I am told that there are no matches but then when I close the app, and open it in half an hour, then I have more matches. There are so many limitations to the app. I never get notifications on my Android phone even though the settings are fine

I think bumble is terrific. It's best feature is the profiles, which have long been great at encouraging users to build something that says a bit more about them. The quick facts allow a good cross-section of a person, while the questions encourage them to open up without authoring a long profile. The 24 hour limit also applies just enough pressure to give those early conversations momentum, while letting go of connections that weren't quite there, to encourage people to find something stronger.

My dating experience on here is very satisfying, I like how the app works. However, I have issues with receiving notifications, even when turning off battery saver or putting high priority from my phone settings. And also, please PLEASE don't send a notification to all my matches when my snooze is over, or at least let me choose whether I want to send the notification or not. It's very embarrassing for me.

80% of my matches never send that first message and when you do get one and reply, its like they deleted the app altogether. Basically any match will most likely waste your time and thoughts. The app would make more sense if it was called "dream crusher" or "crush crusher". And the truth is girls are even worse at messaging first so youre system right now just doesnt work!! And not worth a penny.

Account blocked for no reason given!!...avoid this app at all costs. I've had zero success on this app since April 2020 in comparison to others. I refuse to pay for any dating service long term and I've used the premium once. I went to check this morning and my account is blocked. There are no options to appeal nor are there any options to contact for the reason in doing so. Does the 'freedom of information act' not permit you to share with me the reasons for this action to be taken?

title: FlowMax ME
description:
FlowMax ME is a pulmonary diagnostic software which works with SpiroTube Mobile Edition wireless ultrasonic Spirometer.
SpiroTube Mobile Edition with FlowMax ME is suitable for screening COPD and asthma by measuring and evaluating the lung functions, e.g: forced vital capacity (FVC), peak expiratory flow (PEF) , etc. 


Key features:
Adding/deleting patient
Curve saving
Quick measurement
Prediction
Create PDF Report
Print report with CITIZEN Mobile Thermal printer


Requirements:
-   Bluetooth 2.0

comments: I love this little game. Its fun, fast paced as you want it to be, just challenging enough to be enjoyable. The graphics are super cute. I would definitely recommend to a friend! Super fun! Played 50 rounds the first day. Sound effects a cross between Goofy and The Rock. Good for what ails you if you are (like me) about to barf from all the politics stuff!! Try it; YOU WILL LIKE IT!!

I really enjoy this game. It has zero annoying ads. You do have an ad opportunity, but you gain something from watching it and it's not forced on you. Now that's how ads should be. The game is a good diversion without becoming frustrating. Update 10/23/20 - All morning, I've been getting "You must connect to server" messages. I'm already connected. If I go to the chat and back, it connects. This is a nuisance. I often can't gain credit for the tournament points I've earned.

I have been playing this game for well over a year now. Almost to level 1500. I have NEVER spent one cent. Yes some levels are harder and it takes multiple times to beat it. But they are all beatable. It doesnt have constant ads or pressures to buy extra stuff. If you want it to be easy and spend your money by all means go ahead. Or just be patient and its free to all. Great job guys!! 5 stars!!

I've enjoyed the game so far. I like that there are easier levels and more challenging ones. I also love the unlimited life time that gets handed out, but I do have a suggestion. Why not make that bankable like coins and the boosters? I can't always play for an hour or more, but I don't want the unlimited lives to go to waste just because it's not a good time to play. It would be great to be able to select an increment of time for unlimited lives from your bank. Otherwise, great game.

LOVE THE GAME! However, after the latest update the app becomes soooo laggy. From splash screen to the home screen takes almost 10 minutes. Sometimes when you move to the next level it takes almost 3 minutes to play again. I hope the devs will fix it asap. This is the only game app that love so much.

title: Garden Walk (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow into the headset to move through environment while enjoying relaxing walk.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Breathing Games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/

title: The Survival Hunter Games 2
description:
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! 

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. 

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. 

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.ðŸ‘ˆ

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: Simple Symptom Diary
description:
Symdir is a simple and dedicated app to help you track and understand your symptoms.  We make it extremely easy to record you daily symptoms and how you feel in just a few clicks. Symdir is developed in collaboration with patients, scientists and doctors.


â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜… "Remarkably easy,  and a great way to keep track of your disease symptoms"

â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜… " Intuitive, and beautiful design. So easy to understand.â€

â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜… "Symdir keep me in control of my illnessâ€¦"


Main features
â€¢ Track unlimited symptoms
â€¢ Register factors that you suspect influence your symptoms
â€¢ View your symptoms in an easy to understand graph
â€¢ Smart analyze your data, to find out what could be the course for your symptoms
â€¢ Export your data by email (CSV format)
â€¢ Everything included (NO in-app purchases)


Download TODAY â€“ get in control of you illness. 


This app can be used for logging and tracking symptoms in relation to: Lupus, Migraine, Headache, Post-operation, Pain, Stroke, Diabetes, Sleep Problems, Asthma, Heart Disease, Anxiety, Depression, COPD, and more...

Below you can find a list of common symptoms you can log:
- Headache
- Abdominal pain
- Back pain
- Fever
- Nausea
- Rash
- Cough
- Chest pain
- Lower back pain
- Chronic tiredness
- Diarrhea
- Memory problems

- Heart races
- Fatigue
- Depression
- Sore throat
- Vomiting
- Bloating
- Weakness
- Dizziness
- Heartburn
- Sweating
... and many more

comments: Having tried this app out by recording last month's symptoms and calling up the chart, I couldn't export it even though I have a Google address. Then I found that one of the symptoms appeared on today's date, when I haven't had it today. There was no way I could remove this symptom from today without deleting the actual symptom from the database! Such a lovely idea for an app if it worked properly. And there are no instructions.

The app ws working great for a few months. I was tracking everything in readiness for an important doctors appointment next week. Woke up this morning to find all my tracking has gone! And there is no way that I can see to bring it back! Months of tracking gone. Now this is going to make a huge impact on my upcoming appointment.

Can't export data because I can't add an email. Can't fix this because the email address provided on Google Play Store is no longer valid. Very, very disappointed and sad. This app is incredible but without being able to export data, it's 100% useless.

very simple and easy to use for recording symptoms. the reporting leaves something to be desired. I'd like to be able to select one symptoms and then see how all the factors compare for that one symptom instead of selecting then one at a time.

Excellent. Simple, customizable and for the data junky: exportable. I use it to track any environmental variable, moods, sleep, excercise, water etc and of course every outcome: vigor, acuity and the negative of course headaches, etc etc. Along with myfitnesspal it's the only health ap I need.

title: KUBOOM 3D: FPS Shooter
description:
Online battles with millions of players from around the world! Tune your weapons, upgrade your character and win!

Features:
- Dynamic battles 5x5 team mode, with up to 10 players in the "Deathmatch" with ranks and matchmaking!
- Easy control with the ability to autoshoot (can be disabled in settings)!
- Good optimization and high FPS!
- More than 20 carefully designed and balanced maps!
- More than 50 units of different types of weapons!
- Weapon customization: sights, silencers, lasers, increased clips, compensators and much more!
- More than 100 of the skins for weapons!
- More than 45 clothes for character customization!
- Beautiful graphics, not occupying much space on your device!
- Clans with the possibility of doing clan wars!

Join the community KUBOOM! It will be hot!
Official Facebook: www.facebook.com/groups/369431510160916/
Our Discord server: https://discord.gg/3D7XZmV

The game requires connection to the Internet.
We don't have any pixel guns, only high quality models.

title: Pranayama Free
description:
**Recommended by Leading Doctors**

Download the most popular breathing app in the world!

This is the FREE version of Pranayama. Download the full version to experience longer sessions and full customization. Download it here: http://budurl.me/unlimitedbreath

Pranayama was engineered to teach your body how to breathe properly. Babies naturally breathe diaphragmatically, however adults often take shallow breaths. By training your lungs to breathe at their full capacity, you could experience a whole ton of health benefits!

Practicing slow breathing for only 15 minutes a day can reduce stress and stress-related illnesses. Universal Breathing - Pranayama was created by doctors, designers and app developers to provide the perfect breathing experience. Using the app allows you to focus on your breathing technique and mindful breathing. Use the different music styles to condition your body to either wake up in the morning or relax before you go to sleep.

>>>          Health Benefits         <<<

+ Falling asleep faster
+ Higher athletic endurance
+ Help managing asthma and COPD
+ Decreased blood pressure
+ Relief from headaches and migraines
+ Less stress and better mood

>>>               Features              <<<

- Both body and dial animations available
- 5 different sound settings
- An extensive breathing course from beginner through advanced (Full Version Only)
- Custom courses that allow up to 5 back-to-back breathing ratios (Full Version Only)

>>>     Sound Not Working?     <<<

Thereâ€™s a switch on the side of your device. If it is set to mute (red) then the sound from this app will NOT come through the speakers, however the sound will still work for headphones. Other troubleshooting tips for sound:

- is your device connected to a bluetooth headset?
- have you tried toggling the side switch back and forth?
- is the volume in the appâ€™s settings menu turned all the way up?

Breathe your way to better health with Pranayama.

Recommended by Leading Doctors

recentChanges: Update graphics and bug fixes
comments: Great app. Disappointing that I can't buy the full version cause the link in the ad is dead. Also the audio ads are awful

I like this app but in the past few weeks twice I've had an advert that appears after the session with audio! After a peaceful session of breathing I was jolted by loud audio from some game advert. I understand it is a free app, but surely ads with audio should be reconsidered. Very off putting on an otherwise good app.
The breathing animation remains on for the entire breathing session and uses up considerable battery life.   Otherwise this is a great app,  very effective.  I have the paid version on galaxy note 5.

My psychologist actually recommended this app to me! it really helps with 
my anxiety and falling asleep, I don't have any issues with annoying ads 
what so ever :)

total stress buster. I like the free version customization fine and the sounds are all fine too. Vedic is my favorite. I don't always do the full session but sometimes 1-2 minutes is enough. :)  Wish the app didn't need the screen; app closes when I turn my screen off.  other than that great app.

title: Swimmer (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow into the headset to swim faster and beat your opponent.

Breathing games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.

WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/

Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

title: Lanota - Dynamic & Challenging Music Game
description:
Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book!

AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS

2016 1st IMGA SEA â€œExcellence in Audioâ€
2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award â€œBest Audioâ€
2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia â€œBest Mobile Gameâ€ Nominee

FEATURES

>> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game

Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game!

>> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book

"I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order."
"Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir!

>> Achievement, Leaderboard,  and More

Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save.

** To share the result screen, Lanota needs your permission to access Photos/Media/Files. We won't read your existing photos or files in the process.

>> Unlock Full Function and More Contents

The free-download version is a trial version.
Get full version (available as in-app purchase) to: 
- Remove the progress limit to Main Story
- Skip the waiting time between tracks & go ad-free 
- Unlock "retry" function 
- Enjoy free trial for first track in each in-app purchase chapter

Full version and in-app purchase chapters are all one-time purchase items. If any problem occurred to your purchased items, please contact us.

LINKS

Twitter https://twitter.com/Noxy_Lanota_EN/ 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Official site http://noxygames.com/lanota/

comments: Nice game make me feel better when I was stressed it's better if you add some more musics each music has its unique way. Only problem is sometimes the music is stopping while I'm playing so please rectify this problem as soon as possible. Thank you â¤

Very fun. Slightly different than other rhythm games but very high quality. Good song fidelity as well. Sounds great on a audiophile sound setup and even good on budget audio equipment as well. All around fun game if rhythm games are your style and worth investing in if you enjoy the gameplay.

It's a brilliant story with nice graphic and amazing music. But I just really wish you didn't have to pay to complete the story. You can't go any further into the plot unless you pay money for the full version.

comments: Change the distribution of the ads. Big block up front and, less ads in the middle. This layout is just really disruptive. If the app were glitch free it would be more acceptable but, it's full of bugs ON TOP of all these disruptive ads. I keep getting a buble notice about an "Error Changing Position."

Does not work. They wont let me sign up. I want to be a member, but it just keeps saying "we cannot create an account for you at this time." I even read and agreed to the terms and conditions of the app and they still wont let me. Also, when I try to play a movie, the ads are endless. And when they end, it's just a screen with the crackle logo. I would rate this -1/5 stars if there was an option to do that. Plz do not install. Download Tubi or Pluto instead.

This has to be the most bug filled app I've ever downloaded. There's actually some good content on here but actually being able to watch it after casting to the TV is near impossible. It often will start playing shows that are next to the one you click on and after ads will frequently restart the episodes.

Note to Samsung TV users: Do not DOWNLOAD the app! Please use smart view through your phone instead... You will have little or no freezing.... Downloading the app to your set, you will experience freezing (and a lot of it)!
Nice to have access to the content, but ad times a long AND if you pause at any point, it revert to the last Ad and replays all of them.

title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
description:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, itâ€™s the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Gokuâ€™s Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyoneâ€™s favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
â€¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
â€¢ Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
â€¢ Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
â€¢ Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
â€¢ From Gokuâ€™s Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegetaâ€™s Final Flash, all your favorites are here
â€¢ Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
â€¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
â€¢ Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
â€¢ Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
â€¢ Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
â€¢ Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline
â€¢ Play the board game-style map and all-new story with your favorite Dragon Ball characters!
â€¢ Experience reimagined stories with DB characters new and old

Are you ready to go even further beyond? Download one of the best DRAGON BALL experiences available with DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE today for free!

developerAddress: æ±äº¬éƒ½æ¸¯åŒºèŠ5-37-8ã€€ãƒãƒ³ãƒ€ã‚¤ãƒŠãƒ ã‚³æœªæ¥ç ”ç©¶æ‰€

4.11.2
- Changed the application icon.

comments: This game is really really big. Many characters. Cannon and not cannon. Lots of events and free things. Amazing characters. It makes you think. Team building and a lot of fun. Only compliant is that they're things that it doesn't tell you. So you either have to look it up or learn it. Other than that it is an amazing game and if you like DragonBall I recommend it. The animation has progressed so thats something to take into consideration. If 2d is your thing definite 5*

Great game and fun to play. There is a lot of potential but a few things I wish were a bit different. Drop rates for good units make it P2W friendly, but you can play completely free. There is an energy meter that I don't care for but hasn't been too hindering. If you're a fan of Dragon Ball, check it out! 4/5 only because of low drop rates on a PvE game

Incredible game, the animations are incredible, the artwork the detail put in the game is what has made this game my favorite game I have ever played on mobile. There is nothing that you need to add to it. Just maybe make the chances of getting an LR on a legendary banner a bit more, bc I wasted more than 1000 stones and didn't end up getting the LR I wanted. Other than that, the game is 100% without a doubt the best mobile game I ever played

Genuinely one of, if not the, best mobile game. The gameplay is fun, the animation is slick, and the rates are just right. Alot of gacha games have very low or high rates, low rates cause resentment to the summons, while high rates make your accomplishments feel worthless. The characters and skills are cool, but you have to work for it. I haven't spent a dime on this game and yet I still have good units because I worked hard for them. If you haven't, play this game, you will not regret it.

I've played dokkan since it came out, been through the ups and downs of it all. Played the jp version as well, and the major issue to me is that the content is just lacking. There's nothing really beyond getting the new unit and maxing it. Once you've gotten a huge box and filled out your team's it's just log in for dailys and save stones for new unit. Please dokkan, get some content in this game. I beg you. Beyond that Dragonball keeps me hype enough to keep losing storage space to it.

title: Real Steel World Robot Boxing
description:
Join Atom, Zeus, Noisy Boy, and many more of your favorite Robots in the battle for supremacy of the Real Steel universe. This exciting action-fighting Robot Boxing and Brawler brings the heroic storytelling and spectacular action from over 100 years of Robot Fighting on to your mobile device! Top the Leaderboards, claim the Championship title and reign supreme as the Ultimate World Robot Boxing Champion. Win big in Versus Leagues & Global Tournaments. 

Achieve greatness in the future of boxing, where gigantic robots pack powerful punches. Unleash your fighting style with Deadly jabs, Uppercuts & Special moves to win world championship belts, collect trophies & knockout friends!

UNLEASH ROBOT TITANS 
Towering over 9 feet tall and weighing over 2000 pounds are your 58 ultimate fighting machines, robot titans & legends including fan favorite superstars â€“ Zeus, Atom, Noisy boy & Twin Cities.

BRAWL WITH REAL-TIME WITH FRIENDS 
Unleash your true self in live local Wi-Fi & Bluetooth multiplayer and earn bragging rights while enjoying the winning moment!

WIN EXCITING CHALLENGES!
Play Career, Multiplayer, and the new Winner Take All Mode to become the All-Category Champion.

EXPERIENCE REAL SPORTS ACTION
Build a roster of your favorite sport robots and take on the Legends in enthralling arenas and stadiums. 

PVP & LIVE EVENTS
Challenge your friends, and battle in global events
Lead the Global Leaderboards

UPGRADE & COLOR YOUR CHAMPION
Fight and Upgrade your robot to be stronger, faster and meaner. Color your robot, express yourself and have some fun in the Paint shop!

SHOWCASE YOUR TRIUMPHS
Win Challenges and exhibit your achievements in an all-new Trophy Room.

ACHIEVE GLORY IN ARENAS
Reign supreme in 11 huge arenas that can barely contain these hulking mean machines.

RELIVE THE INSPIRING MOVIE
Play the official boxing game of the blockbuster movie Real Steel. Take your robot champion from the movie for amazing title winning experiences in this smash hit sequel.

JOIN THE ELITE CLUB OF REAL STEEL FANS
Enjoy regular news on game updates, robots, features, views, video tips and more for Free

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealSteelWorldRobotBoxing
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/realsteelgames/
Capture player moments on Instagram: https://instagram.com/realsteelgames/

The game is also optimized for tablet devices

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game power-ups can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your storeâ€™s settings.

* Permission:
STORAGE: for saving the data and progression.

comments: I to spent many hours and more money than I wanna admit on this game; only to log in today (10/23/29) to none of my robots. I immediately restored my purchases, and was only given 2 of the 7 robots I bought, not to mention any gold, silver, or any other robots i lost. Needless to say I'm not pleased, and it's come to my understanding that this is a quite frequent issue and it's outrageous that this issue hasn't been resolved yet nor have the means by which they handle it gotten better.

I have owned more than 50 robots including Zeus, Metro Gold, Midas Gold, Zeus Gold along with just 4 -5 Super bots remaining to bought and completed level 49. Most of the robots reached level 4 abilities after fully upgradation. Day before yesterday the game asked for update, after which the total picture changed. Now I am back to step one after updating and have lost all the robots. I am totally disappointed about this game. I want to remove all the stars but a single star remains constant.

It's a great game, brings me back to a younger age too! My only complaints is the ad after each fight, and the loading screen glitch and that come after collecting the milestone rewards. Other then that it's a great game and I highly recommend it!

OK what the hell. I think my phone died during a fight so I'm thinking whatever. I lost one no big deal. But the minute I freaking load up the game again all my progress is lost and I now have ZERO ROBOTS. is it because I didn't spend any money? Unbelievable

I have been playing this game for a while and then downloaded it on my current phone and I am now level 50 with every bot that is fully upgraded, other than a few super bots, Cardinal Chaos, Dark Fiend and Psytron, with 5400 Gold. Can you make them so you dont have to be VIP 7 to get them? But now a few days ago, my account said unauthorized access to the game, but now i am able to play some parts, but if i go into the store and live events it says it, can you please help me fix this?

title: Zombie Hunter King

Zombie shooting game with simple control.
Select your weapon and beat the zombie troops with global users.

[Features]
- This is action zombie game outstanding brilliant visual and sounds.
- Appear boss zombies and various action zombies.

- Collect your weapons and upgrade them more stronger.

comments: a game as i wanted.... thanks the developer team.... But please develop a save button using gmail or Facebook id so that one can start from the point he saved to another device or mobile. This is very important for us became it may so happen that my current mobile is lost or unable to use.

Was a good game until I spent my own money on it to make it better,then I had one problem with it nothing major just my hp which I used my hard earned money to raise then it went down from 2,000 to 850 of course their was nothing the game development could do,so people please don't waste your money or time with this sorry ass company

This would have gotten a better rating from me, . if I hadn't already been playing Zombie Hunter D Day, I'm assuming both games were developed from the same source. I can see some of the same style except this games graphics and game play feel " elementary" for lack of a better word. Good starter though

This game is nice to play but it keep restarting me and i have to wait and wrk to get better guns. This makes me feel like i cant accomplish a higher levels in this game. Or have differnt views of the game.

Zombie hunter king is nice game, graphics & picture quantity also nice but game maker makes full to game player there are only five levels. Game player thing that game is over but again next level automatic appear; Which I don't like.

title: Ball Blast
description: Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive?
descriptionHTML: Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive?
summary: Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive?
developerAddress: 4 rue Jules Lefebvre, 75009 Paris
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Started okay but the later levels are near impossible to complete given the number of explosions on the screen when you hit a ball, can't see anything and therefore can't move out of the way quick enough. Update: Having played the game for a while longer, I'm frustrated because the follow options are not working: - Being able to select "Extra Cannon" in the store. When selecting it it says "Can't connect to the store, please check your connection. My connection is fine. The other 2 options in the store take a while to activate once you enter the store: - Free Heart option by watching a video - x50 diamonds by watching a video. If these options are time delayed, it would be handy to show the countdown.

Too many ads. Literally 1 after every level. Plus, the game input is laggy, so your cannon is always behind where you're touching on the screen. These people suck at making video games. I hope they die of cancer. France is the worst country in the world. Only losers live there.

This app is very cool & fun to play. Very challenging. As compared to other games it contains very ads. Sounds and colours also add some spice. After if you add all of this it is the perfect game I have ever played!!!. This game is also rated for all ages which I really liked about it.

This game is very addictive and all of that but I gave it 3 star because once I get out of the game and I return the next day....it begins to freeze while playing and I have to keep restarting the game every time. Up until It stops and go back to normal...but like I said this is wu-an-derful...keep it up. This thing also blacks out...and to much ads

It's a very hard game but addicting at the same time, since the new updates this game has wayyyyyyyyyy to many AD's. And try to find away were we can save from where we left off if we ever decide to delete the game.

title: TapTower - Idle Building Game
description:
Build the highest tower and earn as much money as possible in this amazing idle tycoon game. Do you like construction and development? Time to raise your profitable building business. Manage cash and make decisions as a construction tycoon and with every tap your tower will improve. And itâ€™s only for you to know how your tower will look like.
In this idle builder game you will manage many things as in an ordinary construction site. 
- Decide what parts to buy for your tower building. 
- Distribute cash and choose what materials to use in the construction. 
- Accept the challenge for a true capitalist and tycoon. Make your tower the best building in the city!

You definitely will enjoy this idle construction and tycoon game, because here you can build something fantastic. Itâ€™s not like other city builder games. There are no more strict forms of buildings or restrictions. Each floor of your tower can have its own design. It can be anything: castle, mansion of bat, stone fortress, giant fairy tree, sand castle or even a space station. Wide scope to show your talent as a construction tycoon!

Your tower is not only for ordinary people. Even dragons or superheroes want to live here. It means that you will work without a strict framework of building. Creating your own design as simple as it sounds with idle clicker gameplay: buy a piece of building materials with one tap, check out how it looks on the walls of your high-rise tower. Special X-ray mode will help you with this: you can hide everything you don't need at the moment. After the completion of the floor building, you can see how it is inhabited by residents and feel that your work is not in vain. Itâ€™s so cool to be not just a foreman, but the all idle construction tycoon, isnâ€™t it? We make updates with new amazing floors regularly, so you can enjoy the idle building process endlessly. Various improvements will help you build faster and improve your click effect.

Create buildings that cannot be built in the ordinary world and discover references to popular culture in them. Build up your amazing business! Immerse yourself in the creation process, make a wonderful construction and become the richest tycoon in this building idle game.

comments: This game should be called leave and come back later, you can only level up your tap power with gems, and it maxes out so after the 3rd building you log on, hold your finger on the upgrade button for a few seconds, maybe get a free gem then log out and check in 6 hours. Theres clearly lots of towers in the game but i dont want to have to play for 6 months to get them all, at this pace, for me ill probably uninstall.

One of the last updates brought with it an Bad change. One which uses a Ludacris amount of gems. And that would be... The Tap & the idle time upgrades. Which are Essential to the progression of the game. I must ask. Why the change from coins to Premium currency? considering there are 10 Tap upgrades PER Floor. Multiplied by 3 Gems Plus 5 or 6 idle time upgrades If the idle upgrades were Always 5 gems a piece that TOTALS 55 PER FLOOR! ASSUMING the idle upgrades Stay At 5. A piece which is FALSE
Only issue I am having is that I have a had the objective/challenge 'add 1 decor' for about 2 weeks and have added multiple decor options without it triggering the reward.

So I've played for almost a year had over 200 decors added and a ton of floors completed but then I go into it today and it takes me back to tower one. I don't know how this happened but I want my save file back
Will not allow you to watch ads. It keeps saying that video not available. Please fix. Other than that like the game. It is not compatible with my other phone.

title: Army Men Strike - Military Strategy Simulator
description:
Play like a kid, fight like a man in a war without limits! Recruit and train soldiers to build the most efficient army in history! Command the best warriors in this strategy game full of action.

Captain, the evil yellow army is at your door and outnumber your green soldiers. We need to prepare for war. Recruit, train and send troops and tanks against the military invasion.

Army Men Strike is the ultimate war game combining real-time strategy, tower defense, resource control and simulation gaming into a mobile experience! Based on the toy army of your childhood you must defend your flag against the enemy and attack using a powerful combination of tactics to win the miniature World War between your green army and the evil yellow toy warriors! Lead an epic army of green soldiers, remote-control planes, transformers and many other toys in RTS combat! Defend yourself against the yellow soldier army invasion and put your strategy to the test. Using your best survival tactics is the only chance to win.

Experience a great war game, recruit your toy soldiers, build fortifications to win territory and become victorious in this battle simulator. Target your enemy in this real-time military strategy challenge, take your warriors through tower defense battles, compete against other players to expand your territory until victory and earn prestige and glory in this story. Make your enemy go hopeless.
Let's go to the battlefield and start the military conquest.

Toy Tower Defense
â€¢ Wage miniature RTS survival war.
â€¢ Create headquarters, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your train, and collect metal with magnets in this battle strategy simulator. 
â€¢ Adventurous and playful missions and battlefields make this war robots story interesting and fun.

Build Your Warriors Army 
â€¢ Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army and let the toy war clash commence. 
â€¢ Use strategy power to build the best soldier army for each battlefield! Defeat any enemy in the frontline.
â€¢ Upgrade armor, weapons, rifles and machine guns and promote your green soldiers and fighters to shooter flamethrowers, sniper men, tanks, artillery units, heroes and many more army troops.

Take Your Miniature Military Forces to Fight
â€¢ Gather resources to upgrade your squad soldiers and shotgun warriors, shooter guns and base.
â€¢ Create your tower defense with fortifications to keep war toy invaders hopeless at bay and increase your odds of survival. 

Real-Time Strategy and Army Tactics Adventure
â€¢ Choose your military targets on every battlefield and plan your soldier hero conquest. Protect your territory.
â€¢ Put your acting skills and strategy to the test against other players in the RTS survival combat simulator: This is not a toy war robot game, so use your best tactics.

Army Men Strike: Test Your Strategy to Win in the Front-line
â€¢ Build and deploy your army battle troops and legion of military warriors to fight wisely in every adventure. 
â€¢ Compete or cooperate with other alliances for the defense of your territory. Diplomacy or war, what do you choose, commander?

Your war toys are waiting for you to strike in this challenge.
Itâ€™s time to return to the battleground. Enjoy a toy game with worldwide players.

PLEASE NOTE.  Army Men Strike is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your mobile settings.

Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 17 years to play or download Army Men Strike.
Terms of Service:https://privacy.volcano-force.com/html/tos/en.html
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

1. Fixed a display issue (After use) for Amaterasu's Active Skill-Oath.

comments: There is no strategy. Gather, do tasks, build. In the end the players that pay a lot of money have game buffs that cannot be earned. The designers deliberately degrade game performance at critical times requiring players to rebuild and thus spend more money to do it quickly. Update: It is obvious the developers do not test the operation of patches and new events. Each release has a fresh new list of bugs in the software and basic functionality doesn't work. Support is unable to resolve.

Seems a little like it was alot to throw at me at the begging but once I figured it out it seems like its going to be a game I will stick with and get into for a good while. Visionary wise it looks way more amazing then it did on the pictures so anyone who tries for a first time. Well if your reading this review and you haven't downloaded it yet it's a game you will regret not downloading if you pass it up.. Great game only reason its not a 5 star is because I just haven't seen enough yet!

So, it's an OK game for wallet warriors. Although stated in other reviews, one country in particular has a serious advantage, because the prices are high in other countries. Also, it is IMPOSSIBLE to be ahead of anyone whilst not spending money. This game also takes about half an hr everyday just to get most of the free stuff. There's a countdown of 105 minutes to get all the free stuff.... Time waster if nothing else. Just make sure you aren't a big spender. You'll lose thousands here.

After the major battlefield server merge I was left with my identity character name while all the levels that I had worked on earning for the past year and all my resources were reset back to zero with no instructions or notice on how to regain my resources my command center level was zeroed out from 24 to 0 what's the point if you're going to take everything from us that we've earned playing your game
Slows down tablets and crashes constantly. So much lagg and crashes it starting to get old fast. About to uninstall this game after 3 days of trying to play.

title: Light-It Up
description:
Warning: this game WILL hook you - jumping games have never been so awesomely addictive. 
Itâ€™s a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and itâ€™s about time you light-it up and make the colors glow. 

Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up. 

Collect stars as you swing, jump and flip to raise your score, in the funnest of all jumping games. 

Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss and are loving that color glow, things get complicated (or â€œsticky,â€ if you will) as you jump, flip and pass levels. Color shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.

If you miss a jump, if your swingâ€™s a dud, if your flip isnâ€™t on point, or if you hit a spikeâ€¦ you fall into oblivion!

So what do you say, stickman? Ready to swing, jump, flip, light-it up and glow, in the brightest of all jumping games?
