comments: It's decent. Good balance between being too difficult amd not difficult enough. The major problem is that once you hit lvl 50 the ads get to the point where you could probably sue for harassment. Lol, jk. Before lvl 50 there are ads bout every 3 or 4 tries. Reasonable. But after 50 its an ad after every single attempt which has led me to delete it.

Really cool concept, easy to learn, and relaxing even on difficult levels, however, I'm not giving 5 stars for 2 reasons, and I really hope the developers listen to me on this. TOO many ads, I have to turn off my internet because I can't even skip the "Retry?" screen, and there is an ad literally after every death. I understand that there's a profit to be made, and there's VIP, but tone it down a little, it crashes the experience. The other one is a suggestion: An endless mode, think about it

Very fun and addictive. Very pleasing visuals. The ads on the free are not too frequent. A fair and good balance of them. There is no one off as free option and the weekly fee is a little excessive. Would be 5 star if there was an option to remove ads for a one off fee and they can keep the weekly for the other parts of they want.

is literally this is literally the fun ever and plus when you pick new skins are the superheroes and when I play I pretend to be a superhero because I get to jump and go on top of the ships that light up and it is so fun this is like the funnest game I've ever done thank you so much for making this game one point about the ads it's really great at but sometimes every time I'm done with around it is starts an atom you're actually like 20 or five a bunch of seconds and I'm kind of annoyed.

The gameplay is simple but enjoyable but the adds are unbearable. Full screen video adds between each short level with sound that interrupts Bluetooth streamed audio. The juice just isn't worth the squeeze.

title: King of Avalon: Dominion
description:
King Arthur fell in battle, a victim of the betrayal of his nephew Mordred. Now, his body lies in a fortress on the sacred Isle of Avalon next to his powerful sword, Excalibur. It is only when Excalibur is raised again that a new king again will be crowned and the kingdom will be unified. The whole empire has been split into cities fighting each other. Many desire the power and magic of Excalibur but there is only room for one in the king's throne...

King of Avalon is set in a fantasy medieval England bringing back the legend of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table. Build a mighty city, raise a greater army, master war strategy skills for an intelligent strategy to go to battle, train your magic dragon and wage war against your medieval enemy! Join a multiplayer alliance to survive every enemy assault and increase your chances of succeeding! The great war between kings is about to begin! Build the most powerful empire ever!

Raise your dragon and build your army in the PvP quest to lift Excalibur and become King. Taste power and victory while making friends and enemies along the way. Chat, help, trade, and wage war with players around the globe in a multiplayer adventure. King Arthurâ€™s death has left an empty throne... Get ready to get medieval! The epic battle to conquer the kingdom with your dragon has started!

â—† War! Everywhere. You and your army allies need to be prepared. Build up and upgrade your bases and bulk up epic armies with a war strategy - you're not the only ones with your eyes on the throne of the Empire!
â—† Multiplayer kingdom war alliances! No man is an island. Whether youâ€™re rallying against a GvE Barbarian Leader or marching at a PvP bully, youâ€™ll need allies that you can trust.
â—† Send a spy to your enemies with your troops before waging war against the enemy castle!
â—† Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train a legendary dragon to battle in your fantasy army?
â—† Chat & play! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in this real-time multiplayer war.
â—† Strategy! Research and master army attack and defense skills to ensure that you have the edge over your magic enemies. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion in this PvP adventure!
â—† Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon-fire war zone!
â—† Experience a realist gameplay in every mission. Manage and produce resources to build your army, conquer the kingdom, and win the throne!
â—† Epic free MMO fantasy adventure! The Legend of Camelot lives. Awesome monsters and dragons!

Make strategy your ally and build the greatest army of all time in this multiplayer RTS! Be one of the heroes of King of Avalon and become a myth of the dragon-fire war!

SUPPORT: 
https://funplus.aihelp.net/elva/FAQ/FAQList.aspx?l=zh_CN&SectionID=0&pf_app_id=993

Privacy Policy:
https://www.centurygame.com/privacy-policy

Facebook fanpage:
https://www.facebook.com/koadw

PLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free MMO to download and play, but some items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

Do you want to be the hero of the kingdom army, the King of Avalon, a dragon hunter, and become the leader of an empire? Lead your army in this free multiplayer strategy war!

comments: Started playing it, thought it would be 3D or as advertised but it isn't, never mind that, game is too much for my device, way too many things happening. Plus the tutorial is so long, I ended up just building and upgrading things I don't know. In fact all the building made me want to play Sim city, if they designed it that way it be enjoyable.

The only reason I am not giving this game 5 stars is that there is no reward for those who don' t spend a lot of money. All events pull you in to spending money - its a choice, I know but can't some events reward perseverance, loyalty and time? It is impossible to be ranked in anything without spending. The difference in players is obscene. In our kingdom (798) it is impossible to survive without being shielded 24/7, which costs. Saying all that, it's bloody fantastic!

Great Game but only way to Play is to PAY !!! If your short on money this game is definitely not for YOU !!! You can play the game without spending but it will take you forever to build. And you will be constantly being farmed by larger opponents healing your troops and losing your resources. Better to Play a one shooter game or download solitary.

There are several issues with this game. First when tapping the bar to increase resource amount then it maxes it out. This caused me to loss all resource I have gotten so to attack because there is no real good way to get shields that I have determined. Alot of stuff to build that really does not help you at low levels. They say it is used as you get higher level but is very inconvenient at times as it feels like you are missing something. When you are killed you very little resource back even

I really liked this game at first until y'all decided to start charging more and more for everything. Honor pass used to be 2 bucks, then 3 now you want 5 for it. You charge people to get the items just to try and play some of your activities but then you don't even give them enough. And the glitches and bugs? I've had millions of resources removed from my account, I've had issue with claiming on prize packs in my messages. It's ridiculous because no new players are added to our kingdoms ever.

title: Optum TeleHealth
description:
When it comes to health management, knowledge is power. The Optum TeleHealth Solution delivers that knowledge wirelessly through scales, blood pressure monitors, pulse oxymeters, thermometers and user-friendly health questions. The information collected through these devices is shared securely with both patients and their providers, arming both with vital data to help people stay healthy, get healthy or live with a condition.

An easy and effective way to help manage conditions such as diabetes, COPD, heart failure and high-risk pregnancies, our TeleHealth solutions work with many Optum health management programs, providing an integrated and highly effective experience.

title: Butterflies (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow into the headset to see butterflies fly.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Breathing Games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

title: Diamond Digger Saga
description:
Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Can you dig it?

Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.  

Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure! 

Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!Â 

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Diamond Digger Saga features:

title: REAL GUITAR: Virtual Guitar Free
description:
Whether you're already a dab hand, or an axe rookie but have always wanted to learn, this app will help you live the dream! We bring you REAL GUITAR: the best and most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play.

Playing is simplicity itself! REAL GUITAR is an app that transforms your phone / tablet screen into a lifelike simulation of an acoustic or electric guitar.

A fun, light and user-friendly app. Ideal for anyone who wants to study or play guitar without bugging the neighbours or taking up too much space.

You can play chords and pick solos, as well as jam along to music in real time.

Sounds recorded in studio-quality audio.

The library boasts more than 1500 different chords, allowing you to play along to any track you like.

Check out the Real Guitar specs:
- No latency
- Studio-quality audio
- Range of customised chords
- 3 types of acoustic / electric guitars
- 3 playing modes
- 16 loops to jam along with
- More than 1500 chords
- High-fidelity guitar sounds
- Recording mode
- Export your recordings to MP3
- Works with all screen resolutions - Phones & Tablets (HD images)
- Free app
- Easy to use

The app is free but you can remove the ads by purchasing a licence!

Play, strum, pick and pluck to your heart's content with the most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play! Perfect for all kinds of guitarists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners.

Touch & Play!

comments: Don't get this if you're a guitarist. All of the tones are awful. You can't make your own loops. You can record and play it back and play over that, but you can't loop it. ? Pretty stupid. you can't palm mute. You can't do any harmonics. There is no tremolo bar. There is no vibrato. Theres only like 4 tunings. You can't bend. You really can't do anything. Its basically a piano with a guitar skin. Really terrible for anyone that is a real guitarist looking for an app to simulate a guitar.

Hello nice job guys but can u add more tunnings also harmonics also metal guitar sound also i think it will be cool to add some songs to jam along thank you ,can u guys like install palm mute mode , please can u add some rammstein or soad or motorhead that would be sick ,lastly a personal favorite the power of the horde song thank u good job. Please can u add palm muting and bending techniques or harmonics that would be great

Great app, it could be better if in the chord section you can select which notes, strings and solts play and not be limited for just the chord placement because in the solo section is very hard, any way is the best app and it's totally free and you have access to all chords

I am disappointed with the new update. Because whenever I touch a string on solo mode, a typing-like sound appears after. I hope you will fix it. And also, I hope you will increase the sound volume of the strings.
This app is supposedly part of Google play pass, but it still shows ads when subscribed to Google Play Pass. The app is neat, but that seems a bit shady.

title: HEIR OF LIGHT
description:
A Dark Fantasy Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.

summary:
THE NEW GAME Update
Get a ToG Servant, 100M Gold, and five 5-star Summon Stones!
developerAddress: 131, Gasan digital 1-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
contentRatingDescription: Violence, Blood, Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity
recentChanges:
[v5.0 Update Details]
- Heir of Light x Tower of God Collab Event
- Added "Skip" function in Explore and Dungeons
- Added "Craft Gear"
- New Avatars for Blavatsky, Caesar, and Teresia
comments: Update 5.0 replaced most battles with "skips". Turn the game on, Skip 700 battles, auto-pvp for 10 times in 2 modes, turn it off. As for guild war, the same pay-to-win guild has been #1 since the game's launch. The devs really need to balance things so other people have some chance. Anyone who tries their best to get that gw win just once will be sorely disappointed and might as well go play something else. Same people are always #1 in all other modes too. It's a joke.

Played this game for a couple of years. It was fun! But, I slowly saw it go from time2win to pay2win. I used to just let my phone run so I could grind the best 6 star armour. Every now and then they have specialty characters I would purchase for a couple of bucks. Nothing expensive though. But now I can't even fight bosses w/o paying for a "skip" token? I can't even get the option to choose valor like I did before! Welp, guess it's time to move on to another mobile game.

I really enjoyed this game for several months and it was the only one of these types of games I spent money on. it has been a generous game and the one experience i had with customer service was good. The latest patch however 5.0 i think, was a disappointment. It took the fun out of it for me. Adding new features is generally a positive, but not when you overwrite other features. It made it ungrindable. I haven't really been interested to play after trying the new update.

With the new update you really don't have the chance to play ,the skip system won't let you see how your heirs are doing in the dungeon because don't allow to see the fights so if you don't see the fights how you gonna chose the heir that fit you . I consider the developers need to give us the option to chose between skip and use valors. Thanks

Don't bother with this game, you'll soon realize you can't keep up as a f2p player. New unit every other month that is broken so they can release the next one to control it, rinse and repeat since the beginning if the game. Now with 5.0 update they completely gutted the game of what made it unique. Add in the worst type of content in gacha: gear/rune crafting. Materials for this type of content dominate drops from gear/rune dungeons, crafted gears/runes are notoriously worse than farmed version

comments: The game is great, is just that, there is way too many microtransactions, for example, if you want to upgrade your piggy bank, it costs $3.00 to upgrade. If the microtransactions wasn't there I'd give this 5 stars, but then again since there is a lot of microtransactions in this game, I'm giving this 4 stars but overall, ganeplay, is great and the experience is great too.

This game was awesome and very addictive. You can play offline and collect character cards by earning trophy. The only thing that makes it less exciting is that the characters were too quiet. The only thing you can hear was the weapon's shooting, the music, and the scorer's/announcer's voice. It would be more exciting if the character could atleast say a word or make a noise. That way, we can really feel the goosebumps while playing it. The game was so incredible and needs a voice for characters

I play this game for a while and overall is doing great. Until I found some player who has a nearly immortal character. I'm not sure if he cheat or not, but I shoot with a sniper right to the head more than 20 bullets, and the HP doesn't even lower (especially from player with Indian flag) and some player who can deal very high damage that could destroy a base in just a couple shots. Please find out and fix these problems.

Love this game, the graphics are fantastic, the gameplay is good, the cards are unique. The only trouble that I have with this game is the 2v2 button and matchmaking. Apparently, I am unable to 2v2 with my friend and matchmaking just sometimes became rude to me and match me against higher levels than me. But overall, I am in love with this game.

Dude, you said you fix your bug problem. Are you sure, because when I try to find a match and press cancel, it went take me back to my home page. You have to fix that. Otherwise this game is pretty fun and interesting. But I suggest you to fix the bug and add some buff to some weak character. When matchmaking, try to find match within our level, sometimes the difference is way to big, and that leads to an unfair game. And when the character event came out, let us choose what we want to use.ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€

title: Canon Print Service
description:
Canon Print Service is software that can print simply from the menus of applications that support Android's printing subsystem. It can print from smart phones and tablets using Canon printers connected to wireless networks.

Main features:
- Switching between color and black-and-white printing
- 2-sided printing
- 2 on 1 printing
- Borderless printing
- Stapling pages
- Setting paper types
- Secure printing
- Department ID management
- PDF direct printing
- Printer discovery by specifying IP address
- Recall from the share menu

* Items that can be set vary depending on the printer you are using.

If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 6 or earlier installed:
You need to activate the Canon Print Service for printing using it. The Canon Print Service is not activated immediately after installation. Activate it using one of the following methods.
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.
- Tap [Settings] > [Printing] > [Canon Print Service], and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.

*  If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 7 or later installed, the service is automatically activated after installation.

Compatible printers:

- Canon Inkjet Printers
PIXMA TS series, TR series, MG series, MX series, G series, E series, PRO series, MP series, iP series, iX series 
MAXIFY MB series, iB series, Business Inkjet series
imagePROGRAF PRO series, TX series, TM series, TA series
*Except for some models

- imageRUNNER ADVANCE series
- Color imageRUNNER series
- imageRUNNER series
- Color imageCLASS series
- imageCLASS series
- i-SENSYS series
- imagePRESS series
- LBP series
- Satera series
- Laser Shot series

- Compact Photo Printers
SELPHY CP900 series, CP1200, CP1300

Compatible OSs/Terminals:
- Terminals with Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) or later installed.

recentChanges:
Instructions on using the app can now be viewed by tapping the app icon.
Android 11 supported
Fixed minor bugs
comments: Worst printer app. Very unreliable. Everytime I want to print something it says my printer is not available. 90% of the time it doesn't work. Makes my printer useless. Very frustrating. Not the first time Canon apps have disappointed me. Had the same problem with their camera app. I'll be thinking twice before buying another Canon product. Even if it's a good deal.

Not "quick and easy" or functional... Installed the app. Upon opening the app, a static instructional page is displayed telling me to print from outside the app. Moving on to print a document, I select the canon option that now appears from the list of printers and get a nearly blank screen asking for the printer's IP address (unable to be detected itself from it's WiFi function) Searching Canon's troubleshooting page, I end up printing out a configuration page from the printer's menu, and I type in the IP address from a sheet of paper. The confirmation button stays greyed out. My only option is to cancel and delete the app. Because apparently it's just a waste of time.

I'm disappointed that double-sided printing is not supported. The option is present but greyed out. I raised the issue with Canon support but their unhelpful response was "if the option is greyed out then it is not supported" even though the printer does do double-sided printing when used with other products, just not the Canon Print Service!

The latest update removed functionality of the print service for me and my MG6220. The app/service (which now needlessly forces an icon into the Apps list) no longer automatically finds my printer, and when I try to manually find it by IP address, the app opens a numeric-only keyboard (no way to input decimal points for the address!).

I will Never buy another Canon anything again!!!!! When I first got the pixma it worked pretty good. But ever since August it has a mind of its own! It will print one page then grab 50 pieces of paper at once from the paper tray! The next time it won't print at all. I got the Ivy cliq ( for free) and it works on its own but to try and get it to print pictures from your phone? Forget it. I give up! Done with Canon!!

title: War Machines: Tank Battle - Army & Military Games
description:
Choose your war tank, battle the enemy army and win the world war! 
War Machines is the best free army game! Enter this world of epic battles and powerful tanks in realtime action against other top army stars. This military game is designed for the stars who love world war and battle games.

Battle tanks from all around the world, use your military tank to win the war, become the best tank commander in the world of battle stars.

FAST PACED SHOOTING GAME
3 minute action is what your tank has to shoot down as many tanks as you can in battle to win the war against world top stars. 

DEFEND YOUR COUNTRY'S ARMY
Defend the honor of your country against army and tanks from foreign lands. Battle stars tanks from China, USA, Russia, Japan and all the world. A world of tanks in combat!

TWO EXPLOSIVE WAR MODES
Battle in team-based military battles or in the free-for-all army war.

ICONIC TANKS
Choose your tank from a wide range of war machines and like in war make decisions to win the battle and be the star. Choose a light tank to fast scout the enemy's territory and provide battle intel. Or take the heaviest of all, the Panzer, and free your military fury on the enemy in this battle world.

EPIC TANK UPGRADES
Unlock epic war tanks and upgrade it to become the star. Show your enemy who you are with tank customization. Are you ready to be the best of army games? Enter this world of war and be the star of your country!

VARIOUS BATTLEFIELDS TO EXPLORE
Battle your enemies in various World War and general wars battlefields: European cities, industrial zones with war robots... Game the battlefield and master your enemy's army like a world war star.

Download now War Machines, the best free battle war game for free! Get your tank ready and battle in this world where only the best stars army survives the war!

developerAddress: 25-28 North Wall Quay, Dublin 01, IRELAND
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: This freezes so often and the rewards, loots obtained in the battles are so less that it takes a lot longer to buy equipments. Plus the wait time for upgrading the tanks and its accessories is very long. The tanks are over-rated, thus, exorbitant. If there was any option of minus rating, I would rate it minus 10. The game developers should either improve it to meet the demands of its subscribers or the google play should completely ban boring games like this one.

Fun game, however the only way to really advance is to buy the premium. At 8 bucks a week, get real. Same for buying packages, they want to get rich overnight. Need to learn that a million one dollar bills still makes a million dollars. Also, you don't always get credited with a kill. Needs to also be a way to communicate with others during battles. Enjoyed playing, but moving on.

This was a great game for years, but with each upgrade it slowly got worse. Now it's a piggy bank for the privalaged.when it actually works. Whatever it gives you free , it takes from you in equal measure.the minute it crashes or freezes, I'm sorry but your game is unplayable. So if your a new player don't waste your time and effort. Because even if you pay to play it rarely works. They're not so quick to put the problem right for you,

Decent battle game, but Devs need to improve battle matching. Many times the game matches you up with player ranks & tanks 2 sometimes 3 tiers above you -- difficult to compete with that. Also, the game has frequent sever/ connection issues as others have stated. The game selects the server automatically and does not show the option to change if it thinks one is better than another (should alow user to choose).

While I enjoy the game play... I'm completely put off by the constant disconnect. Daily. Multiple times daily. Many times it just locks up and I have to quit the game. Guess what though... it still logs that you used energy to attempt your match. So, you lose that time. That's kind of a big deal for a game that uses three energy an entry. I've tried my home network and I have had the same disconnect issues as my mobile network.

title: Kayaking (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow into the headset to ride through wild rivers on a kayak.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Breathing games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

comments: I love Dragons, so this is very enjoyable for me. Still learning the game only level 86 i think, so still a lot to do to master the game. Update 10/16/2020 I am now over level 110 my dragons are getting stronger and accomplishing more in the gane, it just keeps getting better and better. Definitely worth 5 star rating and if it were possible 10 star. Keep up the great work everyone!!

I'd rate this game 5â­, but everytime I try to watch an ad (for extra rewards), it keeps saying " No ads available " , then after about 3 minutes of try to get the ad to play, the game crashes, and have to wait another 2 minutes for the game to load again...If this issue gets fixed I'll change my review to 5â­, but as it currently is, the game is practically unplayable. (Suggestion: if there's no ad available, you could have it auto give the rewards. Rather than having the game constantly crash.)

This is an awesome game with fantastic graphics! The game play is easy to learn and use. I like that the dragons look lifelike versus other games where the dragons look more like a cartoon. I only gave 4 stars because you can't use a dragon's special weapon until a certain criteria has been reached in the game, which I haven't been able to reach yet.

I've been planning this for a couple of months now and I find it fun and easy to play even though I cannot buy anything with cash because Google locked me out of my account. It's super addictive and got some of my friends and family to start playing too. I only need to spend about 20 minutes or so 3 or 4 times a day and I in the top 40% of the server.

Extremely fun BUT... one of the most expensive games if you want to try to support the devs. If things were cheaper I'd actually spend some money, but 25 + a month for auto play and no adds... no one time purchase options. 30+ for battle passes... The high prices forced a bad rating for a great game. I will probably search for another game to support. Dropped to a 1 star, legion chat always disappears leaving you with no idea about who has asked questions or anything. Pathetic devs.

title: Stack Ball - Blast through platforms
description:
Stack Ball is a 3d arcade game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving helix platforms to reach the end.
Sound easy? You wish!!
Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful platforms that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.
But even black platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump. Other ball games wish they were this fun!

Why Stack Ball rules:
- Crazy fast speed
- Fun gameplay
- Bright vibrant graphics
- Simple and easy to play
- Great time killer


========================
COMPANY COMMUNITY: 
========================
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AzurGamesOfficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/azur_games
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/AzurInteractiveGames

comments: I have to go through the level finishing right at the start. Is this a joke to you? Whenever you hold to try and make the ball go down, you can only get to about 5 or 6 lines and then it just stops and tells you the level is completed. Please fix this. Incredible amounts of lag due to loading Advertisement and overall rubbish. This could do with less advertisement, more bug fixing and communicating. I think this app is lazy and unfinished so this is why I put 1 star. DO NOT GET THIS GAME!!!
I give 4 star because I love this game sooooo much but there is one problem there is soo much ads, When I just Start play the ad will come. But whatever I just love this game!!! ðŸ’•

This game is very easy and fun to play! I love this app I can never get off it. It's sooo amazing I can get different collective items every day and they look amazing! My favorite one is the bomb because it's super deadly in different ways. If you don't like this game then you are totally boring because this game is super fun! So if I were you I would go on play store, DOWNLOAD the app and give it 5 stars.

I don't think so. I could take an ad after three or four levels, but after 2 is ridiculous. Plus, the game cheats. You are not touching the ad at all, you're just sitting there waiting for the "X" out, and before you can "X" out the app OPENS Google Play. That sucks and it's dishonest. I did not want to go to Google Play.

Decent game, tend to enjoy it when I need to kill time. Only problem is the ads. The levels are long enough to not feel constantly bombarded by ads, and this game runs well if you disconnect from WiFi. In this game you can continue from where you lost if you watch a video. But if you say you don't want to continue, it will often play an ad anyway and not give you anything in return? Why play an ad if I just hit a button to not watch an ad and restart the level?

title: Radio FM
description:
Radio FM
Radio FM (Radio for Mobile) is an app to play Internet Radio stations. Radio FM allows you to listen and enjoy a variety of genres like classical, rock, pop, instrumental, hip-hop, gospel, songs, music, talks, news, comedy, shows, concerts and other variety of programs made available by various Internet Radio Broadcasters across the world.

ðŸŽƒWe have added a collection of the spookiest radio stations to give you chills this Halloween.ðŸ‘» Get the best Halloween Radios from around the world in one app! 

â™¥ RadioFM is fully supported for Android Auto, Google Chromecast, Android watch/ wearable
FEATURES
Radio FM is the only app in the Play store that's offering the true Radio Experience with best tuned featured for FREE
â™¥ Add to Favorites (Favourite List)
â™¥ Access to recent list
â™¥ â³SLEEP TIMER (Auto OFF)
â€¢ Listen your favorite radio while you go to bed - without worrying about exhausting your Mobile data
â€¢ Set the Sleep timer in the Radio FM app and the app will do the rest for you. It will auto off the Radio at the time you set
â™¥ â°ALARM CLOCK (Auto ON)
â€¢ Set an Alarm for your favorite Radio
â€¢ It will wake you up at alarm time and tunein automatically to Radio, so that you never miss the next News bulletin or the Talk show or Music DJ or RJ Program that you love
â™¥ Add Shortcut on your Mobile home screen for fast tunein to your Radio Station
â™¥ Simple User Interface
â™¥ Easy to user ever for first time Radio FM app users
â™¥ Quick swap/ Navigation between Favourite List, Countries List, Recent lists
â™¥ Modern design to display the stations listing
â™¥ Radio Stations listing enhanced with Radio Broadcaster's logos as provided
â™¥ Full Radio player to display title information about currently tuned in station in full screen
â™¥ Fast Notification control to stop/start radio stream from home screen
â™¥ Countries list visible with flag of the country
â™¥ Fast access to Radio from
â€¢ Countries list (Select country and touch the Radio Station)
â€¢ Favourite List (Just select the Radio Station)
â€¢ Recent List (Just open the recent list and choose the radio station)
â€¢ Shortcut on your Mobile Home screen
â€¢ Search the radio and select to tunein
â€¢ Option to automatically tunein whenever you open the app
â™¥ Suggest a Station feature to tunein to your local or any other radio station from any city, state or country
â™¥ Easy Feedback within the app so our team can add more features

RADIO BROADCASTERS
Radio broadcasters keep adding their Radio Stations to Radio FM platform through http://appradiofm.com/broadcaster/broadcaster-login/  So Tunein new radio channels every time you use our app.
â€¢ We already have more than 50,000 Radio Stations worldwide
- Be it Kral pop, Super FM 90.8 from Turkey
- Radio Sei, 98.1 FM, 104.5 FM, Tele Stereo 92.7 FM, Centro Suono Sport 101.5 FM, 105 network, RDS from Italy
- Virtual DJ, WIXX, ElectricFM, 1.FM Country One, DEFJAY, MOVIN, WOGK, KJLH, WPOZ, KEXP, KCRW from USA
- Europe 1 104.7 FM, NRJ, Skyrock 96.0 FM, Fun Radio, RMC, RTL2 from France
- BBC, Capital XTRA from UK
â€¢ Still you don't find what you are searching, use Suggest Feature. Our team will try to add every new broadcasters for you, so you don't miss your favorite.

OUR USERS
Radio FM is a trusted Radio App by 50 million user downloads worldwide. We have a promise with our users to provide best playback quality and thrive to make it better everyday.

FAQ LIST
Screenshots and videos available at http://appRadioFM.com/faq-list/

STAY TUNED
Like on Facebook: http://fb.com/radiofmapp
Follow on Twitter: http://twitter.com/radiofmapp
Watch on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/Radio-fmIn

We are tuned to listen to you on support@appRadioFM.com
Keep Listening

comments: Full screen ads WITH SOUND. That's a deal breaker. Won't use. There are plenty of other apps that don't do that or at least provide a paid version to get rid of the ads.

I am still quite new to this app. I like the selection, the dark mode, and that it can disappear while still playing. I don't like how messy it is. Visually distracting and distressing. Too much to look at or see at one time.

I been using it for about 2yrs now I'm satisfied I'm able to listen to stations all over the world if you don't mind the commercials this is the app for you, anything goes wrong reboot it or the wifi continue to work no problem.

This app used to be pretty good for listening to radio stations (which is why it's getting 2 stars instead of 1), but lately its ad to music ratio has gotten very high. For example, I use it to listen to music while I exercise. This morning, the last SIX MINUTES of my workout were solid ads. I don't mind the odd ad between every couple of songs, but not for six straight minutes. I'm removing this app and finding something else for my music listening.
It has stability problem. Many times suddenly it stops until you open it again and play your favorite channel. It's really frustrating. Plz do something for this problem.

title: Remote Patient Monitoring
description:
UTM:RPM is meant to work in conjunction with UTM:Healthcare messaging app which
provides a connection to a patientâ€™s health data and medical support team. UTM:RPM
integrates the messaging technology that the hospital case managers use to receive alerts from the patients. Patients who have been discharged from the hospital with CHF, COPD, diabetes, or pneumonia are eligible to have the UTM:RPM app.

Each patientâ€™s iPhone has been configured by a healthcare professional to be linked to the
UTM:Healthcare server with individual measurement parameters. The communication
between UTM:RPM is entirely HIPAA compliant. The UTM:RPM app integrates with the
UTM:Healthcare app to record baseline measurements of blood pressure, oxygen
saturation, pulse, weight, and blood glucose. Acceptable measurement changes and limits
are also recorded on a per-patient basis.

Questions about how the patient feels together with readings from Bluetooth enabled
devices are reviewed on the appâ€™s screen.

summary: Record healthcare measurements
comments: AMAZING! Within minutes I can give myself a complete test of all of my measurements: weight, blood pressure, pulse, etc. without having to rely on anyone else to do it for me! The hardware to go with it makes it super easy too! The purpose of this technology serves a great cause too. By allowing patients to take their own readings, I can catch irregularities in my blood pressure, for example, before it becomes a major issue, as well as avoid costly, extra hospital visits, which are never fun.

title: Tiles Hop: EDM Rush!
description:
HOT! HOT! HOT!

Monstercat is going online. Play your favorite songs with our newest character. Try to get the highest scores with the FANTASTIC game ever!

Heard About EDM Tiles? With Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! you can play various types of music, from beautiful Piano, Guitar songs to Rock and EDM masterpieces. 

How to play

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tiles. 
2. Don't Miss the Tiles! 
3. You can now upload your own songs to play
4. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song.

The Ball will jump on the Beats Drop. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles. Do not Tap! This is not a Tap Tap game.
Don't forget to make insane combos and beat your friend's scores!

Hit Songs + Ball Game +  Tiles = Awesomeness
Game features
- Auto-generated content: upload your favorite songs to bounce to the music
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Breathtaking 3D visual and effects
- 30+ absolutely beautiful and fun songs to relax
- 20+ Different backgrounds to truly bring you a new experience every plays!
- Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls
- Beat your own top score and dare your best friends for a challenge
- Share your record with your friends, and compare it with worldwide players on the ranking list!
- Connect with Facebook account and sync the saved progress across multiple devices

Bounce off the magic music tiles, listen to the beat, and make as many hops as you can in this mind-blowing music game now for Free!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.

Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! is totally Free! Play this EDM music Running Game now!

comments: It is an amazing game and it is really relaxing. I was fully depressed last month when the exams came, for 2 days I played this and then it was just so smooth. In this game everything is fine except for the ads. I also want to highlight that I also want there real voice. Fix it pls. Other than that there is no problems with the game. And as this is a very relaxing game I would like to tell you all who can download, to download this asap, so that the whole world will be fully relaxing.

I like this app and the songs are really many, but i have a few suggestions. First of all it would be better if they put their real singing voice for the artists in the songs.The second one, there are some missing songs i like it would be an horner to add a little more songs. So that's my suggestions. Now the thing i like (not the ONLY thing) is that the one that says we can play our own songs. I really like that we can play different song. But other than those suggestion, the game is great!

Love this app!!! The graphics are pretty good, but the only reason why I gave this app four stars is because that I just don't really like watching ads. But don't worry Tiles Hop, I still haven't deleted it yet! The thing about the adds is 1, there quite boring to look at, number 2, ads aren't really pleasent for me to hear either. And finally, number 3, I don't like any types of ads no matter what. So can you PLEASE fix this? I really want to take a break from ads for now.

This is the first music game I love, better than cooler hop 3D and I just downloaded it. I can now see what 100 million people download it. The graphics a excellent, the controls are almost perfect and the gameplay is also almost perfect. I can bear the ads and I love it! I can see that it was right to choose this game and I think I'm going to enjoy it.ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ Ughhh! I hate how the voices get higher after you win a level and play it again. Its so much fun the fact of the game its like making a song but a game and it match the beat of the song. ITS worth it buying it now! But here the thing there is some missing song that I would like butt in the future the might fix that, but still worth buying it!

comments: It has everything I want to watch from Disney! I love it sooo much. I had this service since Day 1 and there used to be multiple issues but now it has been a year and it is perfect, no issues whatsoever. I do wish the algorithm for movies recommended to you were on the level that Netflix and Amazon Prime Video has, but I'm sure that will be more finetuned in the future. Overall, I'm very happy with this app and service, and will continue its patronage into the foreseeable future.

Slow. Doesn't load. Says it's my internet but all my other streaming services work great. Hulu, Amazon, Netflix. Wish they would work on that. Also not everything comes up on my watchlist that I have saved. If I manually look for it. It shows in my watchlist but when I go to my watchlist. It isn't there. Downloaded movie to watch on the plane. Didn't work. I like the old Disney movies but not all of them are on here. They say they switch them up but never do.

The app worked great for the first 10 months but over the last month when we're at home watching a movie, the movie will freeze up and then the app will reset. After that, we have to navigate back to the movie. UPDATE.. PLEASE FIX THIS F@UCKING APP! We're paying for a monthly service in which we can't even watch the programing. A corporation like Disney should have a flawless app. The app was perfect and now it sucks.

I love watching my favorite shows on here, but this only works on my laptop and will not work on my phone. I have tried everything to get it to work and the only thing that keeps coming up when I try to watch something is "sorry cannot play if error keeps happening please contact disney support with code 39". But like I said works perfectly fine on my computer. I want to watch it on my phone as well, please fix the problem!

This app is pretty good I have enjoyed it so far. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the app runs a slow sometimes but that could be on my end so I wouldn't take that into consideration too much. I also like the shows that are on there now but I was watching the marvel movies and they don't have Spiderman or The Hulk which isn't that big of a deal but if you wanted to watch those you would need another app +subscription. Overall its a good app and is cheap compared to other streaming services.

comments: Love the game. I'm only giving it a mid rating is because of the ads. Recently there is a repetitive ad for weight loss that looks sketchy, people talk but there's no dialogue, just an annoying soundtrack. There's no product name. I think it's a phishing scam. There used to be a small icon with an ! that gave you the option to hide an ad that was either repetitive or irrelevant, but that has disappeared. Instead now you have to actually close the app and restart it to get rid of the ad.

The game is top notch! A couple of major detractors though. 1. Advertising is way out of hand. Most ads now require two dismissals before going away. The advertisers are also working very hard to disguise the dismissals for the sole reason of keeping their page up as long as possible. And, sorry Mobilityware, there are many instances in which the ad cannot be dismissed after 5 seconds, such as Disney and Purina. 2. The daily goals needs to have a 'turn-off' feature. The speed penalty is too hi

I truly love playing this strategic game!!! It really makes you think outside the BOX!! Not only that, it relaxes your entire mind, body, and soul!! It's a comparative game; in which, it gives you a GREAT!! Brain- Work-out, knowing that you can actually select the RIGHT- COMBINATION OF MOVES and go from one level to the next. I relax with this strategic game daily. Carolyn Reese Atlanta, Georgia OCTOBER 14, 2020

Like game not the ads. I have been playing for over a year. You needs the ads for revenue, I got that. However, pictures of a women's ass in tight clothes is not what I am looking for. If I wanted that I would go to a different site. So select less explicit ads or I go elsewhere. PS children play these games. So you are contributing to the delinquency of minors.

Another great app ruined by ads and greed... I'd happily pay to remove the stupid ads but they're greedy, they want a subscription! ðŸ˜† just charge a one time charge like everyone else. I'm not paying for a subscription that's just nuts.. I've been playing for years and now I'm leaving, plenty of other solitary apps. Also notice all the people complaining about the ads and the developers done NOTHING.

title: Sandbox Pixel Coloring
description:
Welcome to the Sandbox Coloring Universe and be ready to become a lover of the coloring of tiny pixel art.

Four facts about Sandbox:
    - Children feel how light, sweet and funny Sandbox is and that it's made just for them. It's like cartoons, but they can participate in the performance, not only to watch.
    - Parents know it's a great way for the whole family to spend time together. No Ads. Only safe art.
    - Specialists know Sandbox is a great opportunity to work on your children's or parents' drawing and motor skills.
    - Teachers know Sandbox is a great way to teach their kids or students basic number recognition and how to use a legend.

Features available for all:
    - Search whatever you want, fruit, lips, gadgets, cats or maybe easy art. Handy search feature filters all content for you.
    - Magic Round Button helps you to find similar art. Just try it and you'll love it.
    - Collections give you an opportunity to organise all your art in the app.
    - Free Drawing Mode lets you practise drawing pixel art. The best art will be featured.
    - Turning your photos from the gallery into pixel art. No words needed.
    - Hints highlight the most interesting art especially for you. 

Best regards, Sandbox Team [with love]

comments: overall pretty fun, but the app will not let me pay for the subscription. I was able to get through to the 7 day free trial but it won't let me color any premium pictures because I "don't have premium" and it won't let me select another option. I went and cancelled my trial and went back to try again and still nothing. I'm sorry, but it's unethical to take a form of payment from someone for a premium service and then not deliver on said service, even if it has a one week free trial.

I love this app, I have been using it for at least two years and I find it very relaxing and enjoyable. BUT~~ I have notced that recently there are pictures showing up that are exact repeats of something I have already finished. That would be the reason I never gave a 5 star rating, and i hope that these instances do not happen any more. Other than that I highly recommend trying the app.

It's really fun but I can't figure out how to silence the noise for coloring (the tapping not asmr) other than silencing my phone and it's really annoying coz I like listening to my music while playing. Other than that the app runs well with lots of different pictures and a dark mode. I'd recommend. If I get a way to mite the sounds I'll give a 5 star.

I love the App but it can use a few new features to improve the app/game that I would recommend are; 1. Finding a picture/creation by the color most used in it. Like if you where to want to find only stuff that is blue for example. 2. A more clean light/dark/automatic themes. 3. A way to filter out works you had already colored. 4. When creating a work of your own it would be nice to have different sizes in stead of the one size. Ex. Large, Medium, and/or Small. Please consider this thanks!

Great fun! I can colour when I'm bored, draw when I want and it even helps when I'm feeling a bit down because it is relaxing... Also, I love the double tap because it saves time! Just a bit confused - I think double tap filler should start enabled instead of having to open the settings menu to enable it. I But still love it!!! I'm kinda sad though... I made my own pixel art but when I restarted my phone, I signed in, but all my pics weren't there. I worked hard on those but now they are gone ðŸ˜¢

comments: There is far too much luck and not enough strategy in this game. One can use the same level balls, lined up on the same dot, pointed in the same direction, on the same alley, use the same swing; and one week you get strikes or 9s. Next week, tons of splits. The flower pin arrangement is a very good example. The game does not reward figuring out strategy. It also does not provide enough opportunities to upgrade balls. It also does a poor job of pairing u against opponents with same ball level.

Fun! All free for me so far. Update: I still really enjoy playing this game. The graphics are incredible and the ways the balls, pins and alleys interact seems to be 100% true to the laws of physics. Sometimes I'll get startled by the ball or pins shooting back in my face or I'll burst out in a laugh when something unexpected happens. This is still one of my go-to games even when I'm losing.

Your game is the best bowling, most realistic and I used to bowl pro. But it freezes up constantly. Its really frustrating when your bowling for 6,000. I've probably lost 15,000 easy. Please fix the freezing! The lower right side still freezes my stick. I like the changes, however, the one u call Rabbit, 2configuration of 5 pins. These games r to challenge yourself.the only way to get a strike is by accident. Please change the one, no fun.

This app is filled with a bunch of bots. The whole system is rigged. What a disappointment. The balls don't get any better. How I know it's rigged and you aren't playing against live players is try and forfeit in the last frame beforeit even begins. Miraculously it shows the other persons score over those 3 frames when there wasn't even enough time to bowl those 3 frames. Rigged!!!

The game is very nice to play, however, when and if you purchase certain items, they don't tell you that if you don't have that particular ball in play you have to WAIT until that ball Opens up for you. Therefore, you purchased something that may not be available to you when you purchase it! So you have to keep playing, just to see your purchased item! NOT GOOD.

title: Asthma
description: "Most children and adults with asthma find they have times when their breathing becomes more difficult. Some people with more severe asthma may have breathing problems most of the time. The exact cause of asthma is unknown. People with asthma have inflamed (swollen) and sensitive airways that become narrow and clogged with sticky mucus in response to certain triggers. Factors such as a genes, air pollution, chlorine in swimming pools and modern hygiene standards have been suggested as possible causes, but there's not currently enough evidence to be certain whether any of these do cause asthma. The main treatments are: â€¢	avoiding asthma triggers whenever possible  â€¢	short-acting reliever inhalers â€“ inhalers used when needed to quickly relieve asthma symptoms for a short time, by relaxing the breathing tubes  â€¢	preventer inhalers â€“ inhalers used regularly every day to reduce inflammation in the breathing tubes and stop asthma symptoms occurring  â€¢	combined preventer and long-acting reliever inhalers â€“ inhalers used regularly every day which help stop asthma symptoms occurring and relax the breathing tubes for a longer period  Download this free Asthma application to learn more about asthma copd"

title: School of Dragons
description:
Fly fast, train hard, and learn well to become the Ultimate Dragon Trainer! Join Chief Hiccup and Toothless and embark on the thrilling adventures of DreamWorks Animationâ€™s â€˜How to Train Your Dragonâ€™.   
Play with your friends and explore mysterious worlds in this action-packed learning experience! Rescue, hatch, and train Dreamworks Dragons, defend New Berk and the Hidden World, and battle Grimmel and Stormheart in the ultimate dragon adventure! 

***Reached No. 1 of ALL ROLE-PLAYING GAMES in 80 countries ***

Features:
â€¢ Train, fly, and customize over 60 of your favorite Dreamworks Dragons from the movies including Toothless, Light Fury, Stormfly and Deathgrippers.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

For more information, view our current privacy policy (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/Help/privacypolicy) and terms of use (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/help/siteterms).
Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). You will be able to be notified of game updates and new features along with integration to our online educational world for kids.
PLEASE NOTE: School of Dragons is completely free to play, but offers game content, customization options, and items for purchase with real money.  If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases through your deviceâ€™s settings.

comments: Honestly, I've played this game before, so I got it again, only to be disappointed. Whenever I create (or try to) my viking, it stops at the name and says there is a problem registering my viking. Other people are having this issue, but I will keep the game and see if it's resolved soon. Jumpstart Games, fix your game, please.

It's overall a good game that I can spend my time on, but there are a lot of issues that makes many people frustrated. The infamous Battle Event glitch keeps appearing and it sucks. Also, stop changing the Battle Event rewards for the events. I just want to farm gems without engaging in the event, but it forces me to get candy instead. Events should be, well, an event that gives players an option to engage in it or not. Thawfest was the reason why I kept the game uninstalled for months.

It has been awesome playing this game and I love it !!!!!!! I'm glad that you fixed the wild dragon disappearing thing !! But .....I can't do like ....anything ! Cuz you have to pay money for gems and you can't do anything if you don't have gems ! I'd love it if you made there be less coin spending on the new quests and stuff like that !! Please do !!

This game is great.... except that the chat system is awful (the chat is a tad bit too censored and you could get banned for a simple mistake, even though they don't even tell what you said wrong, they just tell you that you said something wrong), the graphics aren't the best, but not the worst, and the controls (especially for decorating the farm) are kinda terrible. But, I suppose it is somewhat decent if you look past the issues. Also, the teen dragons are very glitchy and broken.

It's a fun game overall, but it's also a Pay-to-Win game. You either have to spend money on memberships or gems to do any of the fun quest, or grind for months. I have a membership account and it gets boring because theres no quests until a big update. You should add daily quest to level up your dragons, or just to do something fun. And I also get constantly get "Logged Out" of the game. Please fix that. And the chat is horrible. I can't say Hi or I get muted. But overall, it's a decent game.

title: Boomerang from Instagram
description:
Boomerang from Instagram makes everyday moments fun and unexpected. Create captivating mini videos that loop back and forth, then share them with your friends.

Find something (or someone!) that's moving, or create a video selfie by switching to the front-facing camera. Thereâ€™s just one button. Tap it once and Boomerang does the rest: shoots a burst of 10 photos and turns them into a delightful mini video. Share it on Facebook and Instagram right from the app, or save your video to your camera roll to share later. 

FEATURES

* Take mini videos of your life and yourself using the front and back facing camera. 
* Download and start capturing immediately. No sign up or account required.
* There's just one button! The app takes 10 photos and stitches them together, speeds up the video and then loops it back and forth.
* Share your videos on Instagram and Facebook right from the app, or share them later from your camera roll.

comments: This is a great app but I gave 4 stars because in an iphone there is more time to record, but in Samsung there are literally only 2 seconds. There are also many glitches in this app which are a big problem. So please fix these problems other wise this is an excellent app ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š. It is also a really interesting and fun app. It would also be really nice if there were an option to save the video as a gif.

It is good ....application but we have filters only when we download or have an account in Instagram so in that way I didn't like this application but it is very good app to make GIFs and more ...thank you for developers for developing the app ... And please make one more app that has filters...

Fun but high failure rate. About 23% of the videos I made were corrupt, didn't save properly or something. Given it's a moment-in-time capture which is hard to recreate (esp of animals), that high a failure rate is terrible. Still a fun app to use, to make short videos. Would be cool if there's an option to capture longer videos and an option to save the video as a gif.

Its ok, I was really hoping to free hand the placement of the pictures. Everything else is ok. Not excellent or good. Less options to choose from then expected. The option to blur out was cool but only allowed to resize the blur not pant with it. So it was tricky. Not the best but not the worst. Can tell someone has put thought into it.

Just use the built-in function You can do the exact same minimal functions from the instagram app. However on here, the save feature doesnt work (continuously loads) so you can only post to feeds/stories and it doesn't allow you to choose which account to post to if you have multiple logged in. Fairly pointless when the key feature of 'pointing camera, recording in boomerang style, and saving to device gallery' doesnt work properly

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend ðŸ˜Š this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: Sdorica: Puzzle & Tactical RPG
description:
â–¼Fantasy Strategy RPG
Legend has it that the world was once pitch black, all that existed was one giant dragon. Eternity was given to the humans by the giant dragon, but their freedom was deprived...Those enslaved have finally awakened. They went in search of hope, and a knight named "Vendacti" determined to fight against fate...

â–¼Experience a Story of Heroes and Heroines
Various beasts, an obstinate damsel, a swordsman from the Orient, a female merchant that carries firearms, and many more. Start building your favorite character! Follow the royal princess, Angelia, to protect the kingdom, or follow Leah, the demihuman with rabbit ears and enter the Rune Academy to learn rune magic!

â–¼Collect Magnificent Characters
Wanna collect all kinds of characters? Sophie, a character done in the Onmyoji style; Kittyeyes, the catty maid; Yamitsuki, the killer that dons a kimono; Fredrica, the sexy witch who's keen on getting married; Law, who claims to be martial arts Grand Master, and many more. Follow these incredible characters and explore continent Vendacti!

â–¼Variety of Unique Gaming Modes
Sdorica is a classic fantasy strategy RPG that uses the classic team combo of support, attacker, and tank. Remove the orbs strategically to cast spells, save the world, and achieve your fantasy. There are also adorable monsters for you to breed, and a cooperation system that allows you to fight along with friends and guild members. This fun and fascinating gaming experience is awaiting you!

â–¼Massive, Epic Storyline
Sdorica has an enormous worldview and an unprecedented epic story. Season 1 takes place in the corrupt Kingdom of the Sun that seems perfect on the outside...but darkness lurks within; Season 2 opens up the Desert Kingdom that's constantly engulfed in the flames of war. Besides the compelling storyline, to make the game more lively, we've invited well-known Japanese CVs to do the voices for each character.

comments: Not a huge fan of the battle mechanics.. the story is great, each character seems detailed.. my only quam is that I've done easily over 100 pulls for new characters and have pulled the same 10 blue tier the whole time. Not a single purple or yellow besides the one they gave for free. Quite sad to of spent money for literally nothing. I know it's all chance, but I personally wont be attempting this again.

If there is a single game that I have enjoyed thoroughly through the years and have never been frustrated with, its sdorica! From the music to the story (which is a 12/10!!!) You cannot go wrong, give it a try!

Im giving this one star because while I adore this game I can only play on wifi. I have a good 4g connection on my galaxy s9 plus and it keeps asking for a stable connection. Please fix this its terrible and straight up ruins the game for me. Ill delete this post and give back my 5 stars once this is resolved.

The game is beautiful, i've playing for a long time now. But today is different. After i open the app and tap to start, it went pitch black and never showing the game. Please fix this, and i will give you back my 5 star

I dont usually do reviews so I'll keep it short because this company deserves something for its hard work and after playing for almost two years this game is probably had one of its biggest updates just recently so its clear that they really do care about this game and want to keep it revelant and entertaining, and I really mean that despite sounding like a review bot.

comments: Great Game, Ridiculous Pricing! I downloaded Paint By Numbers recently and found that I really enjoyed it. They make painting these fun, there's a rewards system and achievements. I liked it so much that I decided to buy it... that is until I saw the pricing. $5 a WEEK!! Or the option for $70 EVERY YEAR! No thanks. Game is great, but pricing model killed it.

Hi, I really really love this game the best, but the reason I gave it 4 stars is because when i went today to check my library which is were I finished the pictures, the pictures won't show colored they would show blank and I tried to color them back but when I left the app and came back all my pictures that I painted are blank again! So please fix it then I will enjoy it and give a five star overall I recommend this game its so relaxing and its addictive omg I love this app.

Very relaxing way to spend a few minutes. Pick your pictures right and they come out brilliantly. Only thing I had to change was the highlighter to a brighter one, couldn't see the grey one. Other than that it's great, and addictive, once you have done one and seen what it looks like you immediately want to do another. Finished ones can also be downloaded ðŸ‘

Had to factory reset my phone and now all of my purchased gems are gone as well as completed pictures and purchased collections. No ok at all. Further to my review, ive contacted support numerous times to no avail. Ive done everything asked of me, provided sufficient answers to all questions and provided evidence. Ive been fobbed off and told "we will look into it" and "we will fix this" over and over but nothings been fixed. Either give me my gems back or refund my money. Con artists & thiefs!

I really love this app. The pictures are super awesome! I can however only give 3 stars for now cause everytime I finish a picture it wants to play an ad(which is fine) if the ads worked. With the ads not working I can't move on to the next picture. If that was fixed I would give 5 stars no prob. But I can only do one picture and have to close the app. If you made it so I can continue even if the ads don't actually play I would also give 5 stars. Thanks for your time! Much love.

title: Apk Share Bluetooth - Send/Backup/Uninstall/Manage
description:
âœ°âœ°Apk Share Bluetoothâœ°âœ° - is a app manager that helps Share , Uninstall , Backup and Manage.

Apk Sharer - Send Apk/Link
Using this app you can send apk or play store link easily by :
âš¡ Bluetooth
âš¡ Whatsapp
âš¡ Email
âš¡ NFC and etc.
It also gives you information about app sizes for transfer.

Easy Uninstaller - Multiple Quick Uninstaller
App will help you to find last installed, more size applications and Uninstall it easily in one click. You can also manage system apps, but without root permissions it's not possible uninstall it.

App Backup - Easiest backup tool
Bulk Apk Backup to SD card. FREE UP your device storage! Faster & Smaller.

Features
âœ“ Multiple Apk Share - Transfer apps over bluetooth, email ,Facebook, Whatsapp etc.
âœ“ Multiple App Uninstall - Easy Uninstall multiple app faster in one click. Fast apk uninstaller.
âœ“ Multiple App Backup - Save multiple apk to SD card in one click.
âœ“ Copy multiple app Link to Clipboard
âœ“ Auto Apk Refresher - Refreshes App list on new install or uninstall 
âœ“ Quick Sort - Sort by Name, Install Date, Size
âœ“ View App on Play Store
âœ“ Launch Selected Application
âœ“ Show System Applications
âœ“ Sweet & Usable interface
âœ“ Quick Search - Search your application easily by name
âœ“ Simple Animations
âœ“ App Informer - Shows selected and all application count and size based on your search filter
âœ“ Used Permissions - Shows used permissions by app
âœ“ FREE

Notice:
Â» You can not uninstall system application if root permissions does not exists.
Â» If you are not seeing app on list, try to use Show System Apps option.

â–º Required permissions
â†’	WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For Backup Apk to SD card

â–º Facebook- follow us
â†’	https://www.facebook.com/apksender

We are trying do best for you!

FAQ
ðŸ’¬Why I not see some apk on list?
ðŸ’¡For system app you check the menu "Show System Apps"

ðŸ’¬Can I Share Apk to non Android devices?
ðŸ’¡Yes, if non android devices have bluetooth, email and etc. then you can send , but you can not run apk on non android device

ðŸ’¬Do both people need the app?
ðŸ’¡No , only sender need this app

ðŸ’¬How I can backup all app to SD card?
ðŸ’¡From menu choose "Select All" and then click "Backup"

ðŸ’¬How I can find more sized applications ?
ðŸ’¡Use Sort By Size. You can change sort direction in twice click.

ðŸ’¬How I can find recent installed applications?
ðŸ’¡Use Sort by Date.

ðŸ’¬How uninstall system app?
ðŸ’¡Using this apk uninstaller you can delete only downloaded applications. System app can not be uninstalled. But if you have root permission, then you can delete apk easily using uninstall button.

comments: This app deserves 6 STARS!!!! I love the fact that it gives you the option to list apps from most recent to oldest. I usually share apps using wifi direct between my samsung phones, and this app has never let me down. Does not affect battery life on none of my phone, which was my primary concern. An app that doesn't consume (much) battery isn't certainly doing any background activity. It's a free app, and a good one too; therefore the least I can do is to write this sort of lengthy review, lol.

This is a very good app. There is a SELECT ALL but it's not obvious, long press any single apk, then tap select all context menu. It's also a little odd that there is no save option only share but that's not too much of a problem since you can share to your a file explorer with the added advantage that you can save to any location that you choose at the time rather than a default folder. Overall a very good app.

I'm always skeptical about these kind of apps because they keep promising things and don't deliver. I tried other apps and no luck but this app worked instantly, I'm actually amazed. I transferred an app to my tablet from my phone via WiFi direct and it worked. Now I'm using the app on my tablet. Thank you app developers for making a genuinely easy app to use and that works what it was intended for. I had to write this to let others know. Thank you once again.
I hate it.when i use this app and the transfer finished the other device need to install it say "app not installed" and i try it again "app not installed "plss fix it.
Super when you don't have other speedy files transfer applications

title: Bowling  (Breathing Games)
description:
Blow into the headset to hit the pins.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Breathing Games are based on a breathing technique called Pursed Lip Breathing and they are designed to train kids to make exhalations longer. This is especially recommended for people with breathing related (asthma, emphysema, COPD) and stress related (anxiety, blood pressure) disorders. In general, medical doctors encourage people to perform Pursed Lip Breathing in order to get more oxygen, to gain more energy or to relax.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WARNING: This application is designed to work best with BREATHING+ headset. Using your mobile device's built-in microphone may result in damages not covered by your warranty. Additionally, BREATHING+ headset provides hands-free operation, firm position in front of your mouth and a much better signal-to-noise ratio resulting in more accurate breathing detection. For optimal performance and to ensure protection of your mobile device, buy BREATHING+ headset: http://www.breathinglabs.com/breathing-package/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Be sure to check other games from our collection of Breathing Games!

title: Facebook
description:
Keeping up with friends is faster and easier than ever. Share updates and photos, engage with friends and Pages, and stay connected to communities important to you. 

Features on the Facebook app include:

* Connect with friends and family and meet new people on your social media network
* Set status updates & use Facebook emoji to help relay whatâ€™s going on in your world
* Share photos, videos, and your favorite memories.
* Get notifications when friends like and comment on your posts
* Find local social events, and make plans to meet up with friends
* Play games with any of your Facebook friends
* Backup photos by saving them in albums
* Follow your favorite artists, websites, and companies to get their latest news
* Look up local businesses to see reviews, operation hours, and pictures
* Buy and sell locally on Facebook Marketplace
* Watch live videos on the go


The Facebook app does more than help you stay connected with your friends and interests. It's also your personal organizer for storing, saving and sharing photos. It's easy to share photos straight from your Android camera, and you have full control over your photos and privacy settings. You can choose when to keep individual photos private or even set up a secret photo album to control who sees it.

Facebook also helps you keep up with the latest news and current events around the world. Subscribe to your favorite celebrities, brands, news sources, artists, or sports teams to follow their newsfeeds, watch live streaming videos and be caught up on the latest happenings no matter where you are!

The most important desktop features of Facebook are also available on the app, such as writing on timelines, liking photos, browsing for people, and editing your profile and groups. 

Now you can get early access to the next version of Facebook for Android by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/133NwuP 

Sign up directly here: 
http://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.facebook.katana

Problems downloading or installing the app? See http://bit.ly/GPDownload1
Still need help? Please tell us more about the issue. http://bit.ly/invalidpackage

Facebook is only available for users age 13 and over.
Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php.
